It will be dangerous then...so you try convincing Froggy to get out of the pot, as you both begin to chat...

About meaningless things, mindless things...

Why won't Froggy leave the pot?

name: Frontland
summary: Frontland is an arena-based action game set in a gritty, 1980s-inspired futuristic world. Players fight to the death to pay off debts to the mega-corporation Death by Debt. Navigate neon-lit arenas, master combat skills, and survive high-stakes battles in this thrilling, retro-futuristic experience.

name: Fried Rice Apocalypse
summary: A cooking simulation game where you serve food in an apocalyptic world while trying to survive yourself! Cook a meal for the survivors, Discover new recipe, Meet strange customers and even finding a unique zombies trying to attack you!

name: Frog Detective 1: The Haunted Island
summary: A small sloth has been haunted for weeks by a mysterious ghost that nobody can seem to track down. There's a mystery afoot, and the only one who can solve it is the renowned investigator known simply as The Detective. Finding clues and questioning suspects is just part of the job for such an experienced frog, but this case is a tough fly to catch.

name: Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki
summary: The PlayStation 2 version of Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki includes improved graphics, a new CG opening, and a new world map. It also features two additional female characters.

name: Front Frontiers
summary: The World is on the brink of irreversible Tragedy. Global tensions are rising, alliances are falling apart and states are preparing to decide their fate in the shadow of a massive war. Front Frontiers invites you to fight a massive war, offering an in-depth strategy experience.

name: Friday Night Knockout
summary: A casual arcade stick fighter, great as an introductory title to the genre made for quick 1v1 games.

name: Front Page Sports: Trophy Bass 2
summary:
This is the sequel to Sierra's Trophy Bass game. It features fishing from an overhead view, simulating reeling and reel dragging for different classes of fish.

The game includes a tournament mode and an online multiplayer mode for internet connected computers. Numerous tutorial video clips have been included as well. You can choose your bait and location from various maps and menus.

Tournament levels let you compete with other online virtual fisherman for the best catches. You can strategize by using fishing techniques, picking bait and fishing spots. There is even a fish radar to assist with finding good fishing spots.

name: Froggy's Battle
summary: Froggy's Battle is an action roguelike game set in a loop. Help Froggy the steezy magician skater frog defeat all the baddies squatting her favorite riding spot. Choose your upgrades carefully, become more and more powerful and kickflip yourself through waves of enemies and ferocious bosses!

name: Freak House
summary: "Freak House" is an exciting horror-themed puzzle. You will have to help the main character unravel the mystery of the terrifying House he has found himself in! Your skill in finding objects and will be the key to solving the secrets of the House! Only you can determine the fate of the hero!

name: Frostbite Frenzy: Flower Hat
summary: Add flair to your penguin with the Flower Hat DLC! Whether you’re sliding, smashing, or splashing, this iconic Flower Hat ensures you stand out in every icy brawl. Elevate your penguin’s style and let the battlefield know who’s the most fashionable waddler on the ice!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Tree
summary: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Tree is a mod with 3 new songs, a new enemy, more phases, effects and cutscenes!

name: Freedom Wars
summary:
In the not-too-distant future, atmospheric pollution has devastated the earth and resources have become scarce. Harsh new penal communities have formed in order to survive… The communities, known as Panopticons, battle to secure what precious few resources remain.

Born into incarceration, you are forced to fight for your freedom in dangerous missions. Work together with up to 4-player co-op in a frenetic blend of action and strategy as you fight to rescue civilians in possession of valuable rival Panopticon knowledge. Complete your missions, reduce your sentence, earn your freedom.

name: Fruit Ninja
summary:
Fruit Ninja is a juicy action game with squishy, splatty and satisfying fruit carnage! Become the ultimate bringer of sweet, tasty destruction with every slash.

Swipe up across the screen to deliciously slash fruit like a true ninja warrior. With three games modes in single player and worldwide leaderboards using Openfeint, the addictive gameplay will keep you coming back for even higher scores.

name: Friends & Foes
summary: Friends&Foes adds outvoted and forgotten mobs from the mob vote. One of the main goals is to further expand upon original concepts and add new vanilla-like features related to all the mobs.

name: Frogatto & Friends
summary: This update was significant, and marks when the developers changed it to a commercial game. Earlier versions were available as free downloads on PC platforms.

name: Front Mission Evolved: Wanzer Weapons Pack 1
summary: Cut down the competition with these 3 new weapons - Machine Gun: Dark Hog, Shotgun: Blackstone, and Rifle: Sieger.

name: Frozen Essence
summary: This is an otome visual novel, an interactive story with choices that affect the ending. You start off inside your realm with a few bodyguards to protect you. You may find love, or it’ll end differently. Each path’s story differs greatly depending on the path you land on.

name: Front Office Football Eight
summary:
Put yourself in the Front Office with Front Office Football, the professional football simulation from Solecismic Software.

Manage your roster through trading, free agency and the amateur draft. Create game plans, organize depth charts and watch your franchise thrive for decades.

name: Frogward
summary:
Frogward is a top-down 2D puzzle video game with a time limit, where you control a frog that must keep moving to avoid being eaten by a crocodile.

Gameplay involves moving quickly, jumping across platforms, and using the frog's tongue to propel itself across lily pads and reach the goal before being devoured.

name: Frostpunk: Victorian Edition
summary:
Frostpunk is a city-building survival game developed and published by 11 bit studios. Players take on the role of a leader in an alternate-history late 19th century, in which they must build and maintain a city during a worldwide volcanic winter, managing resources, making choices on how to survive, and exploring the area outside their city for survivors, resources, or other useful items. The game features several scenarios to undertake, each with their own stories and different challenges.

The Victorian Edition includes:
- High Quality Box with artwork from the game
- DVD Box with installation disc
- Card with redeemable Steam code
- "New London - The Art of Frostpunk", 56-page hardcover artbook

name: Frog Legs
summary: A short, single-player horror action game starring Carl, the suburban house frog. Will you be able to conquer arcade challenges, solve puzzles, and Ribbit and Tear your way back to the life you once knew?

name: Fractal Space
summary: Live the memorable experience of a First-Person Adventure & Puzzle Game! Jump over lasers, avoid terrible moving saws, dodge giant crushers, use your Jetpack and Taser-Gun to think your way through Zero-Gravity puzzles of this mysterious space station.

name: Fruit Attacks VR
summary:
Suit up to defend the earth against a fruit alien invasion! 
 
Get your daily serving by piloting one of several distinct SATI speaker robots to unleash devastating sonic attacks using unique shot-curving controls. Think fast though, the host of rotten fruit alien invaders will use different tactics to defeat you. 
 
Grab your HTC Vive Controllers and defeat your enemies with outrageous attacks only possible in virtual reality!

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 9: Return to Crystal Lake
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Frost Survivors: Text Game
summary:
Frost Survivors: Rogue-like Text Game in a post-apocalyptic world!
Get ready to face the eternal winter in Frost Survivors, a challenging roguelike text game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
Lead your survivors through strategic decisions in a world ravaged by nuclear war and endless winter, teeming with zombies, mutants, and bandits.

name: Frag Ops
summary: Frag.Ops is a semi-realistic FPS total conversion mod for Unreal Tournament 2004. Players can choose between two teams, Special-Ops and Mercenaries, each has an arsenal of customizable weapons to choose from. FO takes place in a fictional near future environment, with missions located worldwide. The gameplay in this modern tactical shooter is round based with different objectives for each mission. Be warned, Frag.Ops contains extremely fast paced action.

name: Freddy in Space 2
summary:
Freddy is back... in space! Every good horror series inevitably goes to space, but how many of them go back for a second round?

When Freddy leaves the lunar base on a deep-space mission, the central computer system is hijacked by the newly installed high-tech computer assistant: L.ogarithmic O.nline LAN-compatible Z.ero-error H.ydraulic A.uxiliary X.ylophone(?), otherwise known as L.O.L.Z.H.A.X.

LolzHax has brainwashed the other resident space warriors, Bonnie, Chica, Foxy, and that weird gangly space puppet, and has locked Freddy's son outside the station with limited air remaining. Can Freddy rescue his friends, defeat LolzHax, and save his son in time?

This game was originally designed for the December 3rd, 2019 fundraiser for St. Jude hosted by Game Theory. The live-stream is over now and was a big success. Thank you to everyone who watched and contributed!

name: Free Chess: Bullets Set
summary:
For those who only have piles of bullets to play chess with.
This set was inspired after seeing a couple bullet chess sets, this is a custom designed set and not really based on anything existing.
This DLC includes:
-6 Unique Chess Pieces.

name: Free Chess: Standard II Set
summary:
This set is inspired by a few real world sets.
This DLC includes:
-6 Unique Chess Pieces.

name: Free Chess: Blocky Set
summary:
This Blocky set is inspired by a few real world sets that use a few simple shapes to make up pieces.
It wouldn't be far fetched to see a set like this whittled together nice and quickly on a camping trip.
This DLC includes:
-6 Unique Chess Pieces.

name: Frontier: Battle Royale
summary: Frontier is a classic battle royale game where you fight to be the last one alive. Play with friends, randoms, or bots as you explore a stylized map, loot up weapons, and rack up eliminations. Unlock skins as you level up—no microtransactions, just pure gameplay!

name: Freezia
summary: A cold-sleep management puzzle action game. You are the artificial intelligence called Freezia. Bring peace and order to humankind by putting them into cold sleep.

name: Freezing What If...
summary: Experience an alternate world of Freezing in Freezing WHAT IF..., a fan fiction game that reimagines the world of the popular manga Freezing as a multiverse with an alternate history! A game strategy simulation + turn-based battle system awaits you!

name: Fran Bow Chapter 4
summary: Fran Bow is a creepy adventure game that tells the story of Fran, a young girl struggling with a mental disorder and an unfair destiny.

name: Frogapult
summary: Watch out for the piranhas, gators, spikes and birds as you catapult Kalvin Kroaker through the dangers of the swamp so he can pursue a life of worldly adventure.

name: Frankenstein Master of Death
summary: Victor Frankenstein, an old friend and a brilliant scientist has managed to resurrect the dead! However the border between life and death is fragile and Victor has learned the hard way that this balance should not be tempered with...

name: Frostpunk: The Rifts
summary: Using a new gameplay mechanic, bridge the rifts to access new areas. Expand the city to save your people from inevitable doom!

name: Frogsong
summary: Frogsong is a heartfelt adventure where it's okay to be small. You'll make new friends, explore beautiful environments, and embark on a journey to find your place in the world.

name: Friday Night Dustin'
summary: Friday Night Dustin' is a Friday Night Funkin' mod primarily based on the Undertale AU Dusttale, as well as smaller separate songs themed around it's variants, other Undertale horror themed content, or the larger universe of AU's for the game.

name: Frostflame
summary: Frostflame is a Brazilian Soulslike developed by a single person. In the game you control Chihiro, disciples of the great master Hori Masashi on a mission to advance to the lowlands and bring back peace, ending the war of the five kingdoms and eliminating the power of the Frstlame.

name: Friendly Sheeps: A Cozy Simulator
summary: FRIENDLY SHEEPS is a relaxing sheep farming game in which you create your dream farm in a peaceful, colorful world. With its simple gameplay, meet the needs of your sheeps, craft and sell your products, and grow your business!

name: Framed Fear
summary: You must discover the differences between what you see through the camera and with your own eyes to distinguish real floors from fake ones and escape. It is said that ghosts behave the opposite of humans, and taking the elevator is no exception.

name: Frontier: Elite II
summary: Frontier: Elite 2 is, of course, the sequel to Elite and it continues in much the same way. You have a ship and limited funds, and nowhere to go but out into space. Trade, fight, hunt criminals, work for the various governments, anything goes in Frontier. There are few, if any, limits on what you can do or where you can go. And Frontier's universe (with approx. 100,000,000,000 planets and moons) is so big you'll never see the end of it.

name: FreeCell 2018
summary:
Classic FreeCell, perhaps the most fun game of the solitaire essentials! FreeCell 2018 offers Classic Card Faces with Retina level graphics and a simple interface with no registrations or ads or other such nuisance.

- Clean, efficient interface with fluid animations
- Optional Autoplay takes care of the obvious moves
- Optional Sounds
- Click, or drag and drop, either way works to move the cards
- Smart resizable window

We hope you enjoy FreeCell 2018! If we missed something, please let us know and we'll do our best to get it into future updates.

name: Frogger In Toy Town
summary:
Toppling blocks, falling books...
Things that seem unimportant to humans can pose great danger in the frog world...

Frogger is back! The classic frog-action game returns on Apple Arcade with an all-new look and the same simple gameplay. Guide the iconic amphibian forward as you evade the numerous obstacles in your path!

- Simple tap and swipe controls!
- Playable in both landscape and portrait screen modes!
- Over 400 pieces of furniture and other items ensure that stages are never dull!
- Customize Frogger with over 20 different costumes!
- Various missions give stages added replay value!
- Play together with friends in the co-op mode!

name: Frontiers.io: Expansion Pack 4
summary: Frontiers.io - Expansion Pack 4 This pack contains 16 new Monster, Knights and animal Characters. Unlock them all. Your goal? To conquer as much territory as possible. It's initially very simple, and the game can be mastered immediately, but watch out: there's competition, and not everyone can win!

name: Frog Detective: The Entire Mystery
summary:
You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve 3 thrilling mysteries!

For the first time, all 3 Frog Detective cases are available in one package.

Play as the #2 best investigator as you find clues, question silly suspects, and look at things through your magnifying glass. Some nay-sayers have called the magnifying glass "useless", but what do they know?

Frog Detective: The Entire Mystery is a family-friendly yet witty take on the detective game genre. Solve the mysteries on your own, or play along with friends as you take turns reading out the dialogue. Think you can crack the case?

name: Froguelike
summary: Your choices matter in Froguelike where you play as a frog on a mission to eat all the bugs. Level up, choose new tongues and upgrades, become unstoppable and run straight into the swarm! Unlock all frogs, tongues, items and chapters to become the most powerful frog in the pond.

name: Freedom Planet 2
summary: The sequel to the 16-bit platformer by GalaxyTrail. Lilac, Carol, and Milla must stop the water dragon Merga from resurrecting the ancient super-weapon Bakunawa. It is the second entry in the Freedom Planet franchise.

name: Freeland
summary: Freeland is a virtual universe waiting to be explored, conquered, and shaped by your choices in this massively multiplayer online role-playing adventure. Immerse yourself in a colossal VR galactic online adventure where expansive open worlds teem with endless possibilities. Engage in quests that will challenge and reward you as you traverse this ever-evolving virtual universe. Unveil the rich storyline and forge your identity while connecting with players from across the globe through unparalleled social experiences.

name: Fresh Catch!
summary:
Can you become a master diver and catch legendary fish?

Dive into the depths and prove you can get the freshest of catches!

name: Frequency of Fear
summary:
"FREQUENCY OF FEAR" is a third-person, episodic psychological horror game that drags you into the disctrict of Halimun, a village that used to be known for it's mysticism, folklore, and secrets. Are you brave enough to find out? Discover what's still there in Halimun District!

Play as Maya, an aspiring urban explorer. Break taboos, film forbidden places, and explore the district of Halimun. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, but be careful. Some curses don’t wait to be believed. Stay hidden, and don’t get caught!

name: Fragile Sun
summary: Autumn is coming

name: From the Rain
summary: From The Rain is a single player survival horror game. Reboot the generator, lock all entrances, and defend yourself from the entities that lurk in the rain. Survive each hour and wait for help to arrive!

name: Fritz & Chesster: Chess for Aliens
summary: This educational chess game takes place on an alien planet, in which Fritz and Bianca learn additional tactics and strategies. They learn about the Queen's Gambit, blockades, additional checkmate patterns, passed pawns, the concepts of space and tempo, drawing strategies and variants including dice chess.

name: Freeflow
summary: Freeflow is a fast-paced, skill-based parkour game. This game is set in a mysterious facility where there is a AI voice explaining what to do and where to go. There is a unknown evil to this facility, can you discover it?

name: Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare
summary: Single-player PC game Freeman: Guerrilla Warfare is a unique combination of tactical FPS and strategy game, where the player takes the role of a commander, raising funds, building army, skirmishing enemy forces, attacking and defending territories and conquer the world.

name: Fret Smasher
summary: A community focused band rhythm game with complete player customization and a wide selection of game modes.

name: Fractured Perception
summary: Discover a mystery, understand the danger you are living in, and find the true culprit of a series of disturbing crimes that have occurred around you.

name: Froggy Bouncing Adventures
summary: Jump into a bouncing adventure to save Froggy’s best friend! 60 levels of leapfrogging platforming and hat collection!

name: Fruit Wars
summary: Fruit Wars is a chaotic multiplayer puzzle game where players throw fruits to create matches and score points! Outplay opponents by landing combos, blocking shots, or stealing points. Aim, throw and match to become the true Fruit Chef.

name: Free Solitaire: Nature
summary: 61 card sets with photos of nature: landscapes, animals, thematic close-ups.

name: Frostpunk: The Last Autumn
summary: Learn about the tragic turn of events that lead to the grim world of Frostpunk in the prequel expansion, The Last Autumn. Vastly expanding upon the Frostpunk universe by introducing a brand new scenario, the expansion content also introduces game-changing new mechanics, unique architecture, and broadens the game's deep lore and narrative.

name: Froggie Eggs
summary: Match "eggs" and collect frogs! It's a suika-like game where you merge and grow colorful eggs until they contain frogs, then beat the level and collect the frogs!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Ankha
summary: Vs. Ankha is a mod by Akirawave, the mod is based on a popular character from Zone Ankha and from Animal Crossing franchise. The mod has 3 Songs.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Corruption: Reimagined!
summary: Funkin' Corruption: Reimagined is based off of Phantom Fear's corruption, but with an entirely twisted storyline and new songs!

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Tycoon
summary: Live your pizzeria dreams in this FNaF Pizzeria Tycoon game!

name: Front Mission 3: Remake
summary: Front Mission 3: Remake is the third chapter in the iconic series beloved by fans worldwide. Step into the role of Kazuki and Ryogo as tensions rise across volatile military zones. With the fate of the region hanging in the balance, command towering Wanzers and lead your squad through intense, turn-based battles.

name: Free Heroes of Might and Magic II: Resurrection
summary:
Free Heroes of Might and Magic II (fheroes2) is a recreation of HoMM2 game engine.

This open source multiplatform project, written from scratch, is designed to reproduce the original game with significant improvements in the gameplay, graphics and logic (including support for high-resolution graphics, improved AI, numerous fixes and UI improvements), breathing new life into one of the most addictive turn-based strategies.

name: Frog
summary: Frog is a clicker Game, in which you click a Frog! In Frog you click the Frog to gain even more Frogs! Every 2 hours, you get dropped a new Frog. Frogs is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Freestyle Boardin' '99
summary: Released as "Phat Air Extreme Snowboarding" in Europe and "Zap! Snowboarding Trix '98" in Japan, hit the slopes with Capcom's snow boarding experience Freestyle Boardin' '99. Featuring six boarders and ten different courses, Freestyle Boardin' '99 will test your skills in four modes of play -- Championship, Timed Competition, Freestyle, and Versus. Visit backcountry downhill slopes and then hit the half pipe or straight jump competition, all the while keeping your eyes on that coveted gold medal.

name: Frog Pond
summary: Frog Pond is a relaxed, bite-sized desktop idler where you can decorate a pond and collect different kinds of frogs.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Draw
summary: Friday Night Funkin' Draw is a draw game combined with rhythm FNF music battle. At the end of each level, Friday Night Funkin' Draw will provide you with FNF catchy music from various FNF characters: Garcello, Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster Spirit, Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty.

name: Frontier Force
summary:
Frontier Force is a shoot'em up for the SEGA Master System/Mark III.

The Earth lies in ruins under alien occupation, a harsh reminder of our lost home. A fragile outpost, humanity's last hope, teeters on the brink of collapse.

A hero must rise to defend the outpost against relentless alien invaders. The fate of humanity rests on your actions, and the outcome is far from certain.

name: Freelancer Life Simulator
summary: Become one of the best freelancers, starting your way from scratch. Fulfill orders of varying difficulty.

name: Frenzy Fall
summary: Take on the challenge of going up with your sword in this high-stakes precision platformer! Slash, launch, and maneuver your way upward, unlocking unknown powers—but beware, one wrong move could send you crashing all the way back down!

name: Free to Fit
summary:
Free to Fit! is an amazing block puzzle game with a simple rule. But it's really a distinctive block puzzle game.

Just drop blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally and keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.

name: Freedom
summary: You are the golden eagle, the apex predator of the avian world. Hunt, kill, and fly to survive.

name: Fresh Tracks VR
summary: The critically acclaimed rhythm roguelite, Fresh Tracks, is now in VR! Jump, dodge, and fight to the rhythm of the gods in this thrilling music-action game on skis. Take on obstacles and menacing enemies as you ski further into the darkness that has befallen the snow-covered land of Norwyn.

name: FrogSpin
summary: A wind-up frogventure bursting with colorful platforming and roguelike surprises. Spin the slots, master precision jumps, and rack up points. Ready to leap into action?

name: Franky's Adventures
summary: Join Franky on his Adventure! Wherever he goes, excitement and hi-jinks are sure to follow! Compete against other players in an infinite runner-style game and collect as many apples as possible!

name: Frostfire Planet
summary: Frostfire Planet is a strategy game where each player builds an army of creatures that are sent out in waves against the enemy, around a small 2D world. Use your spells to change the terrain and help your creatures control key objectives. Be the last one standing in this 3 player free-for-all.

name: Front Defense Heroes
summary:
Front Defense: Heroes, the newest update to Fantahorn’s smash hit Front Defense, brings teammates together with you to most fierce war in human history -World War II.
Front Defense: Heroes is a multiplayer VR shooting game set in WWII and can support up to 5 VS 5 online battle.
Front Defense: Heroes delivers the most immersive war experience, using classic WWII weapons in life-like battlefield atmospheres.

name: Friday Night Funkin'
summary: A rhythm/dance game similar to DDR. You play as "Boyfriend" who is trying to date "Girlfriend" but her twisted and evil dad doesn't approve of him and now he must go against many weird and crazy people to win her over by using the power of music. The game features multiple songs, remixes, and playable characters.

name: Freeze: The Escape
summary:
Freeze!

It was a wonderful day for our anonymous hero, at least until the moment when he was torn from his loved ones by a viciously sharp grappling hook.

Locked in a cramped cell on a planet far, far away, our hero could give in to despair and abandon himself to his fate. But with your help he can overcome gravity, turn worlds, and even – escape!

Solving the rotating, physics-based puzzles is easy; just use your finger to continuously turn the cell in both directions around our hero. Of course you also have to make clever use of the Freeze! button, which can overcome gravity. Sound simple? It is – at first...

Freeze! offers completely new and yet immediately intuitive game mechanics, delightfully gloomy graphics from the internationally renowned pop-up designer and illustrator Jonas Schenk, and a very sinister soundtrack from noted Swiss electronic/trance musician Karl Lukas.

name: Frenemies
summary: Frenemies is a cute multiplayer game that strands players on a deserted island in the ultimate test of survival and betrayal. Build a town, form alliances and battle to become the last player standing in a game of social deception inspired by the hit TV show Survivor.

name: Fruit Auto Fighters
summary: Build a team of powerful fruits and battle asynchronously against other players!

name: Fragile Packages: Handle with Care
summary: Leap from package to package in this 'build-your-own' platformer challenge with a daily anomaly challenge. How high will you go and what will you uncover? Collect and open packages to earn cash, then upgrade your stats and items to climb even higher.

name: Freakshow
summary: Welcome to the FreakShow! A twisted FPS and tower defense game show set in the aftermath of the apocalypse where post-modern gladiatorial combat, an ever-changing arena, and your own zombies horde all meet and struggle in a chaotic team vs team showdown! Will you survive the arena?

name: Fred
summary:
The game consists of 6 levels, on which you must obtain treasures and - of course - a map that allows you to leave the labyrinthine pyramid alive.

You must avoid dangerous acid drops, mummies, spiders, vampires, etc. In order to defend yourself from those disagreeable enemies you have at your disposition a gun (with limited bullets), but some enemies are immune to guns, and you must jump or avoid them.

name: Free D.C!
summary: Free D.C! is primarily an adventure game, in which conversations with other characters provide most of the clues. The game is not puzzle-oriented in the way contemporaries such as Monkey Island and Legend of Kyrandia are, and is organized in a non-linear way. Graphics are made using Claymation figures, and the sound includes sampled speech.

name: From Earth
summary: Singleplayer science fiction game focusing on interacting and communicating with alien species. You can either fight or try to find a way to communicate.

name: Fruit Switch
summary: Take part in an adventure where you shoot your sticky fruits through the air with a slingshot mechanism to rescue your kidnapped fruit friends. Discover the interesting and special abilities of all fruits while you fight the vegetables and complete their challenges

name: Free Bowling 3D
summary:
Welcome to the bowling 3D. Free game with no rules, just throw the ball and knocking the pins, soft music and beautiful 3D graphics.
Enjoy!

name: From Lamer to Guru
summary: A game in which you become a programmer!

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 10: The Ripper
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Frontier Governor
summary: Frontier Governor is a city-building game set in 15th-century Korean history. You have been appointed as the local governor, in the historical background of the northern pioneering. Overcome the rough north and lead the frontier through various resources, buildings, technologies, policies, and more.

name: Frosten: Two Realms
summary: Frosten: Two Realms — An immersive story about a young man named Ivan, who possesses the extraordinary ability to freeze objects. His life takes a dramatic turn when he finds himself in a mysterious world brimming with magic and peril.

name: Frantic Birdies
summary: Frantic bird management survival game. Collect worms, collect twigs, create a nest with twigs, lay eggs and hatch new birds and feed them until they are fully grown. Collect jewels that appear as a bird is fully grown. Avoid the bad birds that can send your bird crashing and lose the game.

name: Frog Fall Down
summary: Frog has fallen into a sinkhole, and only you can help him out of the pit while dealing with some of the most janky and unfair physics you'll ever see in a precision platformer.

name: Fruit Ninja VR 2
summary: The sequel to the juiciest VR game of all time! Expand your arsenal with the bow, slice your way through unique challenges and explore the scenic Fruit Ninja temple grounds.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser
summary: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Boykisser meme. The song features 1 week, with the song No More Boykisser based on the song No More Nuzzles from Undertale: Halloween Hack.

name: Fruit of Choice
summary: Casual arcade game. Stay on the move and survive for a long time. Dash to dodge, attack, and explode bombs!

name: Frontier
summary: Frontier is an unreleased Sega Dreamcast network-focused sci-fi RPG. It would have been a Dreamcast-exclusive game, developed by Turbine Studios and published by Sega shortly after the console's launch, but was cancelled for unknown reasons.

name: Front Line
summary: Front Line is a vertically scrolling action game. Your mission is to infiltrate enemy territory and destroy their fortress. To reach the fortress, you will have to make your way through varied and dangerous terrain. Jungles, deserts, brush, and rocks all slow your progress, plus each area has numerous enemy fighters and tanks trying to stop you. To help get past these obstacles, you are armed with a machine gun and grenades; at some points in the game you may even come across an abandoned tank which you can control to increase your odds of survival. When you reach the end of the level and successfully destroy the fortress, the game will repeat at a higher level of difficulty. Gameplay is for one or two players, and four different skill levels are available.

name: Fruit: Chain Effect
summary: "Fruit: Chain Effect" is a link-and-match game where you collect and combine fruits. Obtain fruit items by completing levels or through market drops every 2 hours. Fruits come in Legendary, Rare, High, and Common rarities, with limited drops to maintain balance.

name: From Rust To Ash
summary: "From Rust To Ash" is roguelike auto battler where your items are your build. Fight, Loot, Scavenge. Arrange your items to benefit from each other, store items in your backpack for future synergies, scrap what you don't need to increase your health. Do all that you need to survive the encounters before you.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Nekomata Okayu
summary: Face off against Nekomata Okayu, a chill catgirl streamer hailing from Hololive, in her original song "Mogu Mogu Yummy." With little onigiri prisoners and cool sunglasses and a cute pastel aesthetic, this short and simple mod is perfect for all of us fans of Vtubers out there!

name: Freemium Way
summary: Freemium Way is an adventure game with tactical turn-based battles and sandbox elements. Find all pieces of the puzzle to identify why does Freemium come to the world of modern games and try to curb it.

name: Frogger
summary:
Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

The road is full of cars and trucks, at variable speeds. The river water itself is fatal, as are the snakes which hover within on later levels. Frogger must use the arrangement of logs, turtles (which are only there for a short time) and alligators (but stay away from their faces), and then jump into one of the open home-cells, ideally one containing a fly for extra points. Once all holes have been filled, you move onto the next, harder, level.

name: Frantic Dimension
summary: Frantic Dimension is a retro twin-stick shooter inspired by the earliest twin-sticks, 'Space Dungeon' and 'Robotron 2084'. Never stop moving and shooting... or you'll die.

name: Freedom Drive
summary: Drive for your life, and Freedom. Defeat your challengers, upgrade your vehicle or purchase new more powerful vehicles with your winnings. Race the clock to beat your best time and earn more rewards.

name: Friendly Premonition
summary: Friendly Premonition is a talking sim where you can meet every character from the original game and listen to them talk your ear off about a range of interests. Once they've run out of specific topics, they'll eagerly share whatever thought enters their head. A select number of characters even have special mechanics for you after you've talked to them enough, so make sure you check back.

name: Friends & Fables
summary: Friends & Fables is the AI RPG platform for adventurers and world builders. Explore thousands of player-made worlds or craft your own — then have them come to life in campaigns run by our AI Game Master.

name: Free Fall
summary: A horror visual novel told through the eyes of a sentient FPV drone on its final mission.

name: Fragmented Fear
summary: You take on the role of Miyako, a schoolgirl who awakens in an abandoned school cloaked in an eerie red mist. With no memory of how she got there, she is hunted by a ghostly girl with hollow eyes and cryptic motives. Paired with a haunting soundtrack and a tense, oppressive atmosphere, the game draws you into a nightmare where every corridor conceals dark secrets and every shadow could be your end. Survive, piece together the school’s mysteries, and confront the terror within the mist.

name: From Shadows
summary: What a filth enveloped the world that its only salvation may be… two bloody beasts? Born of anger, blood and night werewolf Gregor and vampire Hredrick launch a crusade in defiance of unspeakable evil. Will they accomplish the mission even though opposed by hordes of hellish opponents, enraged people they are trying to save and even ... your loved ones? There are no illusions. This time the stakes are the highest possible.

name: Fragments of Euclid
summary: Fragments of Euclid is a game about exploring and solving puzzle in a mind-bending environment inspired by M.C. Escher.

name: Front Mission 4
summary:
In the year 2096, the Wanzer ("Walking Tanks" mecha) form the backbone of many military forces. The European Community is enjoying a period of relative peace when it is surprised by sudden attacks on German bases from a mysterious force. To investigate, it is decided to send the EC Armor Tactics Research Corps, also known as "Durandal". Inside the Durandal, a young new recruit, Elsa soon finds herself caught in an international plot. Meanwhile, the nation of Venezuela, is attempting to secede from the Unified Continental States (U.C.S.). UCS Forces are sent in to restore order and dispose of Governor Diaz. During a routine patrol, Sgt. Darril and his patrol witness a cargo plane being shot down. Heading to investigate, they soon discover it was a plane carrying part of Diaz's gold. For demoralized UCS soldiers like Darril, this smells like opportunity... 
 
Front Mission 4 is a turn based strategy game where the plot switches between two different theaters of operation: Elsa and Darril. Controlling the wanzer forces of either character, the story progresses simultaneously. Most battles take place on an overhead map divided into a Player phase and an Enemy phase. Typically a wanzer can move once and use his remaining Action Points (AP) to fire on the enemy or use an ability. Success in battle earns Experience Points, which are traded in for new abilities, such as Rapid Fire or Evasion bonuses. Each character has a set limit of Skill slots, which are filled up differently by abilities. While each character starts with a preference in skills, there is no limitation on what any pilot can learn. Money, found during on the map (along with items) or earned after a successful battle, can be used to upgrade wanzers and purchase new weapons.

name: Frightening Monastery
summary: After receiving a mysterious invitation to a summer camp, you are captured by Sister Madeline inside Eagle's Junior High School. Now, your mission is to escape the school before Sister Madeline manages to complete her evil plan.

name: Frame Machina: OcularZero
summary: Hardcore arcade survival shooter where you pilot a mech completely blind to the battlefield. Your only sight? The minimap. With relentless waves of enemies closing in, precise movement, and total awareness are your only chances at survival. How long can you survive?

name: Fretless: The Wrath of Riffson
summary: In this turned-based RPG, wield powerful legendary instruments, gather mighty riff attacks and save the land from Rick Riffson's devilish goons and musical hybrid monsters!

name: Free Fur All: We Bare Bears
summary: Experience a lively collection of minigames with Free Fur All, where your mission is to help Grizz, Panda, and Ice Bear navigate their amusing adventures in the Bay Area. These engaging games include racing to the finish line, sprucing up selfies, and more, offering hours of entertainment. Immerse yourself in the charming world of three bear brothers as they seek fun while learning and growing in life.

name: Fract Osc
summary: Fract Osc is a musical exploration game. You arrive in a forgotten place and explore the vast and unfamiliar landscape to discover the secrets of a world built on sound. You rebuild its machinery by solving puzzles and bring the world back to life by shaping sound and creating music in the game.

name: Front Mission: 1st Remake - Limited Edition
summary:
The Front Mission 1st Limited Edition includes:
- The base game
- 2 lithographs
- An exclusive lenticular box
- A printed game manual

name: FreakOut: Extreme Freeride
summary:
The steepest slopes, thrilling stunts and dangerous action provide a most excellent skiing experience. At an altitude of 2000 metres, far away from civilization, in a battle between you and nature. Who rides the craziest track, where does the next jump lead to; speed, tricks or staying upright - Only those who are willing to push their own boundaries will experience the ultimate adrenaline rush!

For the first time the player gets the opportunity to go off-piste with his skiers without being cramped by unrealistic barriers. Stylish jumps, no rules, extreme speed, off-piste, crazy stunts – that’s in! No barriers to prevent the player from feeling the real freedom of fresh powder snow while screaming down mountainsides with only their nerve to hold them back.

name: Friday the 13th
summary:
The game is a 2D action horror based on the first movie of popular horror franchise Friday the 13th. The game casts the player as one of six camp counselors (three girls or three boys) at the Camp Crystal Lake and the player´s main task is to defend the children in the cabins situated all around the lake while slowly killing Jason.

The cabins are frequently attacked by the mass murderer and the player must get to the attacked cabin within the specific time limit otherwise Jason kills the children. When all the camp counselors or all the children are dead, the game is over. Jason can attack the player outside cabins too, on the pathways when exploring. There are three cycles meaning, Jason must be killed three times (every time Jason is stronger and quicker) to beat the game.

name: Freddi Fish: Kelp Seed Mystery
summary:
The award-winning best-selling Humongous children’s property made popular on the PC is now available for Wii!

Help the Sea Creatures and Save the Reef! Grandma Grouper’s kelp seeds are missing and, without them, all of the sea creatures will go hungry! Help underwater detective Freddi Fish and her finny friend Luther solve the case. Explore marine caves, deep canyons, and fascinating places like King Crab’s Castle in an effort to rescue the colorful reef!

name: Frozen: Olaf's Quest
summary: In this humorous epilogue to the motion picture, ‘Disney Frozen: Olaf’s Quest’ hands center spotlight to Olaf, the outgoing, innocent and comically carefree snowman from Disney’s epic comedy adventure. It pairs tightly tuned platforming action with light puzzle-solving elements across 60 imaginative levels, complete with hidden collectibles, side challenges and unlockable customization items.

name: Frog Folding Simulator
summary: Fold frogs and give them hats! Frog Folding Simulator is a cute and cozy origami simulation where you create a herd of origami frogs to watch over you as you fold more! Customize your frogs with colored paper, hats, bows, mustaches, and stickers! Just enjoy the music, and let the frogs take over.

name: Fruit Fusion!
summary: Help Aira, Rinka and Yuri merge fruit and unlock new cards in this sweet and charming Suika x Deckbuilder!

name: Frontline: Fields of Thunder
summary:
Frontline: Fields of Thunder covers the Battle of Kursk in 1943, the largest tank battle of all time, the ultimate battle of the titans by the German Army. This was a major battle on the Eastern Front of World War II and the last German blitzkrieg offensive in the east as well as the last German offensive of such scale in the war. The Battle of Kursk remains both the largest armored engagement and the most costly single day of aerial warfare to date.

The game allows players to immerse themselves into detailed gameplay on a sizeable battle map, with historically accurate environments encompassing exciting missions and challenges. The historical settings and scenarios are so accurate that the game comes with a complete encyclopedia of all units represented in the game.

name: Frost World
summary: The world has frozen over, and survival means more than just escaping the mysterious danger—it's about conquering the cold.

name: Frog Corner
summary: Frog Corner is a single-player horror game where you go to an abandoned arcade looking for the arcade machine "Frog Corner", yet you go too deep inside the building. The deeper you go in the weirder and deadlier it gets.

name: Freeforce Airplanes
summary: Freeforce Airplanes is a dynamic air racing game where you control airplanes, fight with opponents and strive for victory at incredible speeds. Choose from 10 unique planes, customize them with a variety of skins and conquer 8 exciting locations!

name: Fractured Online
summary: Fractured Online is the first open-world sandbox MMORPG mixing action combat with fully interactable environments and grind-free progression. Gather resources, craft, trade and venture into legendary travels as a solitary hero, or start a settlement with your guild and grow it into the next empire.

name: Fray: Reloaded Edition
summary: Fray: Reloaded Edition is a fully simultaneous, turn-based multiplayer strategy game. Set in a dystopian future in the year 2098 where human interaction is confined to virtual reality modules, three mega-corporations vie for control of Earth. Within the combat module, Fray, pledge allegiance to one of the corporations and take control of a squad of four soldiers from six classes with unique weapons and abilities. Choose your squad wisely, assign actions and when the turn timer is up, watch the action play out in real-time cinematic fashion.

name: Frontier: Path of Shadows
summary: Fight enemies, upgrade your squad, and explore new planets! Make tough choices and shape the fate of an entire sector in Frontier: Path of Shadows. Experience a richly crafted 25th-century world and tactical combat where X-COM meets Final Fantasy.

name: Free Chess: Brutalist Set
summary: With a concrete aesthetic, these pieces would make any grown man cry once stood on.

name: Fruit Adventure Returns
summary: This Bundle contains the game "Fruit Adventure Returns" in 03 versions (Xbox One + Xbox Series + Windows).

name: Fractured Red
summary: A science fiction visual novel. Deep beneath the surface of Mars lies a secret that will change everything. Six researchers. One rift. No one will return the same.

name: FreeCraft Survival Pocket Edition
summary: You enter a survival world where there's no way out. you must find food to eat and keep away from the monsters! Things will go worse when the night came -- zombies and other night monsters rule the world. you need to learn how to find things, craft new items and use them, kill your enemy and survive.

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator VR
summary:
Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria Simulator VR is my take on the original game adapted into VR.

Take control of your own pizzeria as you complete late-night work.

name: Frick It
summary: Chill looking, co-op horror game about the world is ending, a giant magnetic storm is after us. As conscious robots, collect fuel with our scrap vehicle, dig crytals, fight monsters and try to survive on the endless road and learn the story from other failed robots.

name: Fractala Sandbox
summary: Explore the elements of Fractala Sandbox and its large-scale physics-based simulation. A pure sandbox experience featuring everything from wavy water and sticky slime to viscous lava, coiling honey, squishy jelly, compressible snow, piling sand, aerodynamics, solids, rope, fire, and explosives!

name: Fragance Point
summary:
Fragance Point is a trippy 3D exploration game.

Fragrance Point is a digital paradise where you can do everything you want: Dress up, dance with aliens, and knock big things over. Make new friends, embarrass yourself in front of everyone, and you might just find a way into the station's core.

name: Frame Gride
summary: From Software's attempt to create a fantasy-themed take on Armored Core. The first game of it's type to feature online multiplayer for a console, years before Armored Core would include it.

name: From View
summary:
Explore more than 30 simple but beautiful diorama-like rooms in this relaxing adventure / puzzle / hidden object game hybrid.

Collect items, solve simple puzzles, and piece together the clues to unlock and rekindle the five shrines.

There are no threats to overcome, no opponents to defeat, and no clock to rush against. You will find some quiet puzzles and beautiful, simple scenery.

name: Fraud Camp: Survival Escape
summary: “Fraud Park: Survival Escape” is a stealth-survival adventure. Trapped in a guarded compound of patrols and cameras, you must search for tools, keycards, and intel to escape. Every noise risks exposure—distract, evade, or fight back. Choices lead to escape, rescue, or exposing the park.

name: Freud Gate
summary:
"Doors exist to isolate.
You are the key, or rather, the one who can open the door."

Freud Gate is an interactive story game about the story of dream and redemption.

Freud Gate, the "door of heart" in the game. Players will play as a spiritual mentor and help the depressed girl to find a breakthrough. The game is divided into two parts: the real world and the imaginary world. It aims at making the player realize that only by truly understanding the depressed people can the player help them.

The main gameplay is puzzle-solving and exploration. Each level in the game will have different puzzles, and only after solving the puzzle correctly can you enter the next level. Player's bad decisions may put the game into bad endings.

name: Free Chess: Lewis Set
summary: Play a game of Free Chess with this iconic Lewis Chess set!

name: Fracctal Monsters
summary:
Fracctal Monsters is a play-and-earn virtual petcare game built on the Algorand Blockchain. It uses Algorand NFTs to simulate the growth and evolution of unique pets, and is a progression of classic Web2 games such as Neopets, Tamagotchi, and Webkinz.

If you are a fan of quality virtual pet games, then Fracctal Monsters is a must try.

name: Frisky Tom
summary: A prototype game that was never officially released for the Atari 5200, Frisky Tom is a port of the obscure Nichibutsu coin-op of the same name in which you play a plumber who must climb up and fix broken pipes to keep a steady stream of water flowing from the tank at the top of the screen to the reservoir at the bottom. Unfortunately this house is infested with mice which roam the screen, gnawing through pipes and generally causing problems for our man Tom. Once a mouse gnaws through a pipe, you'll see the flow of water stop and a pipe piece will fall to the ground. To repair the pipe Tom must pick up the fallen piece (you can hold two pieces a time), and put it back into the hole. To get to where the holes are, Tom must carefully climb up and navigate the maze of pipes. Although Tom can cross short gaps in the pipes, he'll need to go around the larger ones. While climbing around on the pipes, Tom will run across several different kinds of mice. Each mouse has its own color and purpose. When the flow of water is interrupted, the timer in the reservoir will begin to count downward from 5000 at the rate of 100 points per second. The only way to stop this countdown is to restore the water flow by fixing the pipes. If the timer reaches zero, Tom will lose a life and play the current level over again. If Tom is able to get enough water into the reservoir (keeping the timer above 1500), he'll be rewarded with a bonus intermission showing a woman taking a shower. - Excerpt from

name: Freeky Faucets Arcade
summary: In Freeky Faucets, you play as these round beetle bugs called Boogas. The Faucets have invaded ally grounds! Eeeyikes! Don't worry hero, Faucet Friend will assist! (for a price). Discover his comrades too!

name: FrenchConnection
summary: Identical in looks, height, and figure yet polar opposites in heart, twin sisters pull me into a dilemma: pursue the high-school first love I've longed for, or the coworker twin who openly longs for me? A sweet, bittersweet tale of tangled affection.

name: Frisbee Forever
summary: Frisbee Forever is a licensed, level-based mobile game. The gameplay consists of steering a frisbee through a set of boost rings and into a goal.

name: Frog Heist
summary:
Commit the greatest heist in frog history...

Steal famous artwork as a cute frog to build your own art gallery!

name: Francisca
summary: Today my parents went to Mexico for a week, and I’m gonna have to spend seven days alone in our new house.

name: Freddy Spaghetti 2
summary: Freddy 2.0 is here! Freddy is spaghetti. Oh, and conscious. Freddy 2.0 has got a job! The story starts as you plunge headfirst into the workplace. Overcome the environment, master your spaghetti and run to the coffee machine! Don’t be late on your first day! Freddy Spaghetti uses rope physics to simulate a squishy, stretchy, ropey character.

name: Frost Bite
summary: Use your grappling skills to climb each mountain. Watch out for snow beasts!

name: Frogrammer
summary: Hold on to your tadpoles! Frogrammer is a tug-of-war auto-battler where you fight hordes of increasingly nasty insects. Choose from a roster of unique frogs, spend your money wisely and find the right strategy to SQUASH.THE.BUGS.

name: Front Mission
summary: Front Mission is the first main entry and the first entry overall in the Front Mission series. Front Mission is part of a serialized storyline that follows the stories of various characters and their struggles involving mecha known as wanzers.

name: Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball
summary:
Baseball player Frank Thomas licensed one of the first baseball games to use motion-captured 3D graphics and multiple camera angles. 28 stadia have been rendered in 3D, and each has its own visible and significant differences.

There are 6 distinct game modes, allowing for single exhibition matches as well as full seasons on the playoffs. There is also a Home Run Derby mode, allowing the player to pelt the ball out of the ground for points.

You can choose pitchers and batters, based on their statistics and form. Bowling options are set to define the delivery, with fastballs and curveballs as well as more precise setting of pace and height. Fielding is optional - it's best to leave this to the computer at first You can always alter the infield and outfield depth and shift.

name: Friends Killing Friends
summary: Friends Killing Friends is a PVP deathmatch where you kill your friend with a gun and a bunch of cards.

name: Frog Knight
summary:
Frog Knight is a precision platformer where every jump counts and every fall hurts.

You play as a cunning frog armed with a sentient sword. Together, you must escape an ancient, vertical pit by mastering the power of Bounce: hitting floating objects in the environment to launch yourself upward with speed and precision.

There are no checkpoints. One mistake can cost you minutes of progress, but also teach you to master the physics-based movement system. Along the way, you’ll unlock new mobility abilities that completely reshape how you navigate the world and recover from falls.

Combining dark fantasy pixel art with a light touch of humor, Frog Knight offers a gameplay experience that’s both punishing and satisfying, made for speedrunners, skilled players, and anyone who loves a good climb.

name: Frogreign
summary: Leap into Frogreign! Set forth as Rill, an exiled prince traversing the wild depths of their kingdom as they unravel a royal conspiracy. Master your agility, sword, and sticky tongue to defeat wild beasts and explore ancient dungeons in this swashbuckling, amphibious action-adventure!

name: Frog Island
summary: Frog Island is a fully hand-drawn, cozy Frog Collection and Life-Sim game. Take care of adorable frogs, grow crops, cook meals, place toys and decorations, and uncover the secrets of Frog island!

name: Fruit Salad
summary: Fruit Salad is a cozy physics-based match 2 game where you drop and merge fruits together to try and beat the high score before you reach the top!

name: Frozen City
summary:
A city-building simulation game set in an ice and snow apocalypse. As the chief of the last town on Earth, you have to gather resources and rebuild society.
Collect resources, assign workers, explore the wilderness, conquer tough surroundings, and use various methods in order to survive.

name: Frog & Blade
summary: Killed by the mysterious villain Frogman, the protagonist wakes in bed as if nothing happened. As the master of a kendo dojo, he tries to resume daily life—until strange powers and mysterious foes begin to appear. Battle, choose, and reshape your destiny in this multi-ending visual novel.

name: From Red to Green
summary: Change all red objects to green, systematically clicking on them with the objective of solving the puzzle in the lowest number of moves possible. If you click on a green object, it becomes red, and the opposite is also true. Some levels have inverted controls, and others have moving objects.

name: FreshWomen
summary: FreshWomen is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the best parts of life. Become a freshman attending Minerva Bay College, romance girls and solve a mysterious incident. Your journey will be filled with comedy, drama, and lots of sex.

name: Free Dunk
summary: "Free Dunk" immerses you in street basketball, celebrating individuality and competition. Build your legend, craft a dream team, and join global streetball leagues. Experience the raw joy of the game with controller support—hit the streets for epic battles!

name: From Cheese
summary: Twist your mind, challenge your skills, get the Cheese!

name: From Ruins
summary: A new-gen detective adventure combining deduction gameplay with a gripping story full of twists and turns. Gather clues, establish connections, and solve a series of increasingly challenging cases. Will you uncover the feud that began at the end of the world?

name: Framework: Found Footage
summary: Through the lens of VHS camera, you are given the task of unraveling the twisted framework of seemingly never-ending liminal spaces, also known as the backrooms. Explore unique narrative driven themes of solitude, mystery, and horror.

name: Fruity Friendz Adventurez
summary: Are you ready to help free Peter Pear, creator of the Fruity Friendz, who is locked up in a castle, by defeating Villainz and annoying Crumbleez, face many challenges and collect coins and fruit to earn one of a kind items?

name: FreeCell Solitaire Classic Card Game
summary: Enjoy playing FreeCell Solitaire from the #1 Classic Card Game Collection for free. Customize your game with awesome card designs, backgrounds and win animations adding even more fun to this classic game.

name: Free Solitaire: Kids
summary: Additional kids-themed card sets for Free Solitaire. Also, backs, backgrounds, board elements and UI pictures.

name: Free Solitaire: Girls
summary: Additional AI-generated card sets with beautiful girls for Free Solitaire. Also, backs, backgrounds, and board elements.

name: Free Solitaire: Dogs
summary: Additional dogs/puppies-themed card sets for Free Solitaire. Also, backs, backgrounds, board elements and UI pictures.

name: Fruit Slice by Motion Capture
summary: This is a very classic fruit cutting game, but it is not controlled by a mouse or touch. Instead, it uses a camera to capture the trajectory of your arm and control the knife light to cut through the fruit . So,You only need a regular camera to experience the joy of real-time motion capture games.

name: Frog
summary: Welcome to the charming world of Frog, the ultimate idle clicking game that combines adorable aesthetics with the thrill of collectible trading. Immerse yourself in a cozy, cute universe where your primary goal is simple: click on the frog to increase your score and watch as delightful rewards unfold!

name: Frowning Vermin
summary: Frowning Vermin is a wild horde survivor game where you fight waves of messed up critters, like thousands on screen at once. You unlock upgrades that get crazier every run and stack into stupid builds that melt everything until the swarm becomes too much to handle and you get buried.

name: Frequency: Chernobyl
summary: An immersive single-player adventure in which you are a radio enthusiast, who has dedicated his life to unraveling the mysteries of radio transmissions. Your path leads you to the Exclusion Zone, where you meet a temporal anomaly when a radio signal turns out to carry the voices of people from 1986.

name: Fruit Mess
summary: A distinctive feature is the construction of objects not only horizontally or vertically but also diagonally.

name: Frogmonster
summary: Discover some of the most charming and challenging bosses in Frogmonster, a Metroidvania FPS adventure where you explore a lively world filled with creatures, bugs, and beasts.

name: Friday Night
summary: Investigate a family’s gruesome fate, communicate using your microphone to uncover the truth, and hide from the spirit. Film the whole experience in your camcorder for the world to see.

name: Frogs Kitchen
summary: Embark on a culinary journey like no other in "Frog Kitchen Tycoon: Idle Venture"! Dive into the whimsical world of frogs and kitchens as you traverse through various exotic locations on a planet teeming with flavor and fun.

name: Freddy's Archives: Remains Of The Past
summary: Freddy's Archives:RemainsOfThePast is a horror adventure, inspired by the Five Night`s at Freddy`s book series, a fan favorite.Explore, and survive - in the FazbearBox warehouse, monsters of the past are hunting you, don't let them grab you, and escape alive from the hands of death.

name: Freakshow: Anniversary
summary: Who doesn’t love the circus? Come play some circus game, Continue Michael’s story Or maybe see the circus freak! (Watch out, they bite!) Enjoy the Freakshow circus in all its glory!

name: Free Solitaire: Animals
summary: Additional animals-themed card sets for Free Solitaire. Also, backs, backgrounds, board elements and UI pictures.

name: From Frontier
summary: By an accident，the protagonist set out on a journey to the "Lemuria Continent" with the second princess of the demon country who was running away from home.Awaiting in the pioneer land is encounters with dangerous monsters, unexplored land, and fascinating beauties.

name: Frog Smashers
summary: A local multiplayer brawler game about hitting frogs with baseball bats.

name: Frog In the Well
summary: Frog just wants to get out of the well.

name: Fractal Gallery VR
summary: Immerse yourself in a cozy space and take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life by exploring the beauty of mathematics.

name: Frame of Mind
summary: In Frame of Mind, you are placed in a world where logic is escaping you. Each area of the game defies reason, requiring you to think outside the box in order to solve the illogical and escape madness.

name: Fresh Tracks Snowboarding
summary: Fresh Tracks Snowboarding is a fast-paced extreme sports simulation, combining console quality graphics & physics with arcade style game play. Compete in a series of freestyle, race & trick-race events across an international stage. Have you got what it takes to win the Prestige Tour?

name: Frogger Returns
summary: Based on the timeless arcade game, Frogger Returns delivers the addictive dodge-and-run gameplay fans know and love for a new generation. Players are thrown back into the hustle and bustle of city life to guide their amphibious friend, Frogger, from the city back to his home marsh. Frogger Returns stays true to the classic arcade gameplay style, but is enhanced with improved graphics, a new camera angle, and new levels. Streets, sewers, subways, and numerous other obstacles and enemies are in play - all for the sake of keeping Frogger away from returning home! But Frogger isn't surrounded by just hurdles -- new power-ups including time reverse, invincibility and time freeze also aid Frogger in his travels.

name: Franky the Bumwalker
summary: Due to the unfortunate side effects of a teleportation jaunt, Franky indeed walks on his bum.

name: Frogger 3D
summary: Frogger is back, and he's bringing a whole new dimension with him! Just in time for his 30th anniversary, Frogger is back, crossing streets, taking names and coming at you in 3D! The excitement of Frogger's timeless run-and-dodge gameplay is arriving at a Nintendo 3DS near you, with fun new graphics, novel level twists, and new friends to help Frogger make it across the way!

name: Fruit Mountain
summary: Fruit Mountain is a 3D physics puzzle game where you stack fruits. Combine fruits of the same kind to make them bigger and bigger! Stack them up without overflowing the plate and create your own Fruit Mountain!

name: Free Solo: One Life
summary: An endurance rhythm game that only gives you only One Life to simulate the danger of Free Solo Climbing.

name: French Crime
summary:
The French government is calling on citizens worldwide to restore justice!
French Crime is a realistic and immersive criminal investigation game.

name: Frantic Freighter
summary: This game is optimized for VR, but does not require it. Frantically attempt a delivery across space in a freighter. Unfortunately, your ship is constantly falling apart. Trade spare parts, find stashes & evade pirates along the way. Succeed to unlock challenges!

name: Fresh Merchandise
summary:
Fresh Merchandise is a Dungeon Crawler without Combat.

The store "Dungeoneer Gear" is completely out of wares! Its brave merchant has decided to get some new items alone. Trouble is... They don't know how to fight.

You play as the merchant and will be exploring dungeons, evading enemies, grabbing loot and escaping before things get out of hand!

To keep your shop in business, you must reach a quota of goods. However, be careful what you pick up, as the more weight you carry, the slower you move.

name: Freddi Fish 2: The Case of the Haunted Schoolhouse
summary: So who is haunting the schoolhouse, taking the toys and practically scaring the scales off all the guppies?

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Freddi Fish 2: The Case of the Haunted School House

name: Frets on Fire
summary:
Frets on Fire is a free, open-source Finnish music video game created by Unreal Voodoo. Players use the keyboard to play along with markers which appear on screen, with the aim to score points, achieve a high point multiplier, and complete a song. Frets on Fire was the winner of the Assembly 2006 game development competition.

The game is written in the Python programming language, and is licensed under the GNU General Public License, although the game incorporates other free and open-source code under other licenses. The game's included song files and some internal fonts are proprietary, and their redistribution is not permitted outside of the Frets On Fire executable.

name: Fragmented 6th
summary: "Fragmented 6th" invites players to experience a captivating blend of psychological tension and chilling exploration. Will Oliver decipher the cryptic messages hidden within his dreams, or will he succumb to the darkness that lurks in the fragmented corners of his subconscious?

name: Fruit Mart Simulator
summary: Run your own fruit store! Restock fresh fruits, design your store layout, and manage daily sales. Keep customers happy and grow your business into the most popular produce shop in town!

name: Fruit Slide
summary: Use keyboard arrows or drag the mouse to slide colorful fruit tiles! Match identical tiles to clear the board while special Bomb, Flip Control, and Empty Tiles can help or hinder your moves. Sharpen your strategy in this addictive puzzle challenge, now available in 24 languages worldwide!

name: From Orbit
summary: From Orbit is a quick and light single player Action RTS. Guide your stranded crew home as they land on alien planets, scout out the area, build defenses, harvest valuable resources, and launch back into orbit before being overwhelmed by hostile aliens.

name: Frostpunk 2: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Contents:
• Frostpunk 2 - The Game
• Digital Artbook
• 'Warm Flesh' Novela
• 3 Future DLCs
• Captain's Hall - Exclusive In-Game Item
• Soundtrack

name: Fruit Postal Service
summary: Fruit Postal Service is a package-delivery, battle-racing game where you play as members of the Fruit Postal Service: Walter Melon, Bandana-nana, Jack Apple, and more! Use your unique fruity abilities to deliver the most fruit to your customers and become employee of the month!

name: FreeCell
summary: FreeCell Solitaire is a mobile card game where players arrange a standard 52-card deck into foundation cells by suit and ascending order. Players can utilize four free cell spots as temporary storage while moving cards from the tableau to complete the sequence. The game features daily goals, an experience system with level progression, and unlockable titles. Unlike Klondike Solitaire, nearly all FreeCell games are solvable through methodical planning.

name: Frontier Hunter: Erza's Wheel of Fortune
summary: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands. And thanks to that, the empire expands rapidly.The top hunter, Erza, leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach.

name: Frogger
summary: A second Frogger Tiger LCD game.

name: Fruit Arranger
summary:
Fruit Arranger is a fun puzzle game where you have to place fruits on a 9x9 table. When you match 3 in a same row or column the last fruit placed will transform into another fruit. Your goal is to place as many fruits as possible without getting stuck.
OVER 100 ACHIEVEMENTS to gain

name: Frogger's Adventures: Temple of the Frog
summary: Firefly Swamp is dying and the frogs from the Elder Council have asked Frogger to save it! To do so, Frogger must undertake a grueling quest to collect the sacred elements needed to keep the swamp alive. These elements have been stolen by the evil Mr. D and have been spread throughout four perilous worlds. Frogger must travel to each world retrieve the stolen elements and defeat Mr. D's evil henchmen. Then and only then will he be able to enter the Temple of the Frog to face the treacherous Mr. D.

name: Fracture: The Dream
summary:
A sudden and seamless realization of consciousness...

Play as Monoe and explore a Labyrinth of interconnected worlds, wherein you discover secrets and come to shocking conclusions.

A 3D Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Freezing Knights
summary: A light co-op turn-based RPG. Take control of two knights and try to reach the end of the perilous snowy mountain paths​ by avoiding enemy attacks and powering-up your characters.

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 12
summary: Franchise Hockey Manager returns for the 2025-26 season with plenty of new additions to the deepest, most authentic hockey strategy gaming experience you can find. Choose from teams around the globe and select a team to guide to glory, including a chance at the ultimate prize, the Stanley Cup.

name: Freddi Fish 3: The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
summary: The Great Conch Shell has been stolen and it's up to Freddi Fish and Luther to catch the culprit!

name: Fractured Lands
summary:
"Players beat down, gun down, and run over the competition in this last one standing PvP shooter set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Your vehicle is your lifeline, your greatest weapon, strongest armor, and your best chance at outrunning a deadly encroaching storm!

LAST ONE STANDING
The sound of your heart pounding is drowned out only by the roar of the engine. You’ve taken your place in a circle of death at the center of the apocalyptic wasteland. You wait with only your rusted metal ride to defend yourself. Out there lies the weapons, gear and fuel you’ll need to earn a blood-soaked victory.

Can you be the lone survivor in an arena of road warriors hell-bent on destruction? Start your engine, hit the gas and drive to survive!"

name: Froot Loops: Black Beak's Treasure Cove
summary: Run, jump and fly from level to level to find the clues Black Beak has left for Toucan Sam's nephews!

name: Fright Train
summary: Fight through a train overtaken by monsters and survive Antarctica’s cold as paranormal special agent Doug Barker in this chilling single-player third-person survival horror game.

name: Fritz Chess 17 Steam Edition
summary: This chess program offers you everything you will need as a dedicated chess enthusiast, with innovative training methods for amateurs and professionals alike using the neural chess engine "Fat Fritz".

name: Fritz&Chesster: learn to play chess Vol. 1 - Edition 2023
summary: Strategic thinking, tricky brain-training, exciting competitive situations, lots of fun and a good serving of chess knowledge - all this and more in this unique, international award-winning chess adventure game.

name: Frozenheim
summary: Frozenheim is a serene Norse city builder with elaborate management gameplay and RTS tactical combat. Lead your Viking clan through hardships of the frozen north, season by season, year after year. Build and survive. Set sail, explore and conquer. Win Odin’s favor and secure your place in Valhalla!

name: Froggy Hates Snow
summary: A survival roguelike where a frog digs through freezing snow, uncovers treasures, unlocks upgrades, and battles mystical creatures. Find the escape door or defeat the final boss to survive.

name: Fri: The Unforgettable City
summary: An adventure game where your choices change the world. Fri, a girl working at a coffee workshop, lives in a town that feels strangely mysterious. What will she encounter in this town while suffering from amnesia, and how will the world changing?

name: Front Mission 2
summary: Front Mission 2 is a tactical role-playing game for the Sony PlayStation developed by G-Craft and published by Square Co., Ltd., and was released in Japan on September 25, 1997. Front Mission 2 is the second main entry and the third entry overall in the Front Mission series. Like other Front Mission titles, Front Mission 2 is part of a serialized storyline that follows the stories of various characters and their struggles involving mecha known as wanzers.

name: Fruit Mountain Party
summary: A brand new game in the hit 3D puzzle game "Fruit Mountain" where you combine fruits to make them bigger is finally here! This time, it's fruit battles!? There are plenty of versus modes that everyone can enjoy! Get together for online or local multiplayer! Keep stacking those fruits!

name: Fray
summary: Fray is a gritty sci-fi game set in 2098, a world where civil society is on the brink of collapse. Three mega-corporations vie for control of the Earth and its remaining resources. In a world where most human interaction is confined to cyberspace, mankind has created a variety of virtual reality modules in which to escape the harsh realities of life and experience the full range of human emotions once known by generations past. Some modules are created for human enjoyment while others have been created to serve more devious purposes. One of the most pivotal virtual environments is the combat module, Fray.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Hotline 024
summary: Meet Nikku, an alien girl that crashed on earth and was captured by a secret agency, she has been used for experimentation for years, until one day she was able to escape and decided to hide in an abandoned mall.

name: Fruity Freddy
summary: Freddy's job is to pick all the fruit in Mr. Meano's back garden without being killed. The planted seeds grow up into flowers which eventually produce fruit. The player completes a level if they pick all the fruit, but if a piece of fruit becomes too ripe it explodes, spreading four more seeds onto the screen. If Mr. Meano sees the player pick a plant before it bears fruit he will emerge from his house and chase the player.

name: Frontiers
summary: Play as a robot on the world of Epsilon where you must protect the Zebs who are the last living beings on this planet.

name: Friend of a Slime
summary: Friend of a Slime is a horde survivor game in which your best weapon is your slime companion. Fight against hordes of enemies in short 10-minute dungeons, collect coins and fruits to unlock new weapons and purchase powerful artifacts for yourself and your slime companion.

name: Fruit Ninja 2
summary: Ever wondered what it feels like to slice your way through exciting new Once you start beating levels, you won’t want to stop!

name: Frakktus
summary:
Frakktus is an abstract metaphorical representation of the mandala of consciousness, in the center of which is the core of truth, surrounded by mental blocks. Blocks are our fears and doubts, obstacles and complexes. Your role in the game is to control the probe and destroy these blocks, releasing truth from the core. But you need to constantly move, because only in motion the probe beam is able to damage blocks that attacking the player in the rhythm of music. Accumulate mantras and cores of truth, discover new enemies and fight against them for the truth. 
 
If you are tired, you can turn on the Relaxation mode and contemplate the relaxing interactive kaleidoscopic effect on the screen that responds to music from your library. 
 
The unique mandala at each level, the endless gameplay and the color variety of the palettes will help awaken the player’s hidden emotions, remember forgotten truths, escape from routine affairs and possibly discover something new. 
 
Frakktus is a neo-arcade game inspired by the classic retro games of our childhood, created with a unique visual style that combines a mixture of fractal nature, ethnic symbols and cyberpunk lights. 
 
Frakktus is a color shot in consciousness!

name: Frostpunk
summary:
Frostpunk, the newest title from the creators of This War of Mine, is a society survival game where heat means life and every decision comes at a price. In an entirely frozen world, people develop steam-powered technology to oppose the overwhelming cold. You face the task of building the last city on Earth and securing the means necessary for your community to survive.

Optimization and resource management often clash with empathy and thoughtful decision-making. While city and society management will consume most of the ruler’s time, at some point exploration of the outside world is necessary to understand its history and present state.

name: Freckles
summary: These are cute little creatures that come from the planet Mercury. On a mission to earth to the united nations, the freckles are challenged with the earth's space junk.
