While flying there spaceship they accidently crash into a fridge, crashing in the backyard of a greedy family named Maus.

name: Frozen Free Fall
summary: A block-matching game based on the 2013 Disney film, Frozen.

name: From Next Door
summary: From Next Door is a short mystery-horror game developed for the 2016 Pixel Horror Jam, featuring 100% original graphics, story-driven gameplay, exploration, and decision making. It draws inspiration from the works of Junji Ito and games like Silent Hill, with the story focused on the eerie and the bizarre. The story is about Namie who has just moved into a new house, one that was rented for a too-good-to-be-true price. It seemed like a good idea at first - nice house, low price, fully furnished, quiet neighborhood… but when she comes across a locked room on the second floor, she starts to realize there's more to the house than what she was told. Why is that room locked? Why did the previous tenant leave the house so suddenly, leaving his things behind? And what's the deal with the windowless house next door?

name: Frontier Roots
summary: Survive and thrive in a pixel art survival RPG set in the Alaskan wilderness. Trap, fish, forage, and build a village from scratch. Face shifting seasons, craft to endure the cold, and live in harmony with nature in a world where every choice matters.

name: Frodoric the Driver
summary: Frodoric is a Belgian shepherd who has run out of his favorite cigarettes. Due to the regulations set by the government and national health care, the Tobacco Store is far away and requires him to embark on a journey through hundreds of locations. Hop in the car with your best friend Furcat (persian cat) and drive! Key features: - Drive through dozens of unique locations and regions! - Slam other cars to score points! - Use many types of weapons to break through the obstacles on the road! - Collect points and buy new vehicles! - Fantastic music that will help you relax for many hours! ‚Äì Dynamic weather and procedural difficulty system! - Fantastic retro-like visual style!

name: Free Strategy Chess Game
summary: 1.It is The Strategy Chess Game. 2.All operations are performed using the left mouse button. 3.In the world map, left-click to move the character. If the character is not visible, click the second and third buttons below to locate them.

name: Freedoom
summary:
Freedoom is a project aiming to create open content for the free and open source software Doom engine. The project distributes three IWAD files: the two single-player campaigns named Freedoom: Phase 1 and Freedoom: Phase 2, and FreeDM, which contains a collection of deathmatch levels.

The project presents itself as complementary to the free and open source code of the Doom engine released by id Software in 1997 under the GNU GPL license. The content is licensed under the permissive 3-clause BSD license. It allows custom levels and other customizations designed for Doom, Doom II or Final Doom (e.g. PWAD files) to be used with Freedoom.

name: Frido
summary: Robot time traveler got into the past. To get out, he needs to get to the time machine, passing more than 10 exciting levels.

name: Frog Bath
summary: Bathe your Frog King by jumping, hopping and tonguing yourself around maps in Frog Bath with the goal of beating your friends at giving His Cleanliness a bath! Spit and steal bath items from your friends to give the best bath possible to the Frog King.

name: Freedom's Twilight
summary: Summoned to the strange dark fantasy world of Amissus you will encounter both natural and supernatural obstacles as you explore, collect, craft, learn, build, and survive the fog blanketed realm. Fight back the abhorrent creatures of darkness and build yourself a place you can call home.

name: Frog Escape
summary: A frog girl, trapped in an underground lab, overhears a shocking plan to dispose of her. Determined to escape, she sets out to find freedom. Navigate obstacles, avoid enemies, and help her break free!

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Reggie the Rat
summary: It seems like this rat wants to spit some funky rhymes or maybe something else...~

name: Friday Night Fever: Frenzy
summary: You're Fever, the mayor of Fever Town! A trip back from space caused you to crash here instead of home, and things began to pile up on your desk ever since. Once an abandoned spot on the map, it's now a hot spot for the world's rejects, criminals, scumbags and any others shunned from their homes. Your girlfriend is also from space, and you're hiding some dark secrets from her... can you handle a relationship as well as you can handle being a mayor?

name: Frogger: Ancient Shadow
summary: Frogger is Back to His Classic Beginnings. His home of Firefly Swamp is being overrun by Dr. Wani and his evil plans. Join Frogger in his latest adventure as he explores seven different worlds and tries to restore order to his beloved swamp. Features classic, addictive "hop and dodge" gameplay. Mini games with up to 4 players on all platforms. Over 30 levels of play. Wide range of character moves, such as the double jump, tongue grab, and more. Special bonus - orignial 1981 Frogger arcade game included on all platforms.

name: FragPunk
summary:
FragPunk is the new free-to-play 5v5 hero shooter poised to break the rules of combat.
What makes FragPunk different is the introduction of Shard Cards that can affect the playing field for all players.
Shard Cards are voted on by players before each round and can change the entire playing field – from making player’s heads big to your team into zombies when you are downed.
FragPunk has a low barrier entry but a high-level of gunplay mechanics making it a great choice for casual gamers to hardcore FPS fans alike.

name: From Eva with Green
summary: From Eva with Green is a unique atmospheric pinball game.

name: Friendship Bracelets Simulator
summary: A little game about making friendship bracelets

name: Frogun
summary: Join Renata as she adventures across a world of mystical ruins with the titular FROGUN! Frogun is an old-school platformer with the soul of the PS1/N64 era, in which your frog-shaped grappling hook is a your best friend!

name: Frob
summary:
Life was simple.

Frob was just chilling by the pond, watching his tadpole kids wiggle around.

Until BAM ! a stork swooped in and scattered his children far and wide across the world. What a day...

Now it’s up to you to guide Frob through a world way too big for a small Frog.

Bounce on beetles, swing from dragonflies, collect some tasty flies and explore the world beyond Frobs comfort zone!

But most importantly: get your kids back!

Leaving the pond was never part of the plan — but adventure rarely is.

Small frog, Big leap!

name: Free Durov
summary: FREE DUROV – experience all the hardships of prison life and try to escape using your intellect and agility. Can you overcome all the traps and keep the encryption key safe?

name: Friday the 13th: The Game
summary: Friday the 13th: The Game is a third-person horror, survival game where players take on the role of a teen counselor, or for the first time ever, Jason Voorhees. You and six other unlucky souls will do everything possible to escape and survive while the most well-known killer in the world tracks you down and brutally slaughters you.

name: Frontier Mech: Ash Walkers
summary: Frontier Mech: Ash Walkers combines TPS combat with tower defense in a post-apocalyptic world. Pilot powerful mechs, build and upgrade defenses, and fend off insectoid invaders. Collect resources, enhance your mechs, and tackle challenging missions in this action-packed strategy game.

name: Freedom: First Resistance
summary:
Freedom: First Resistance is a third-person action-adventure game set in a future where Earth has been invaded by the alien Catteni race.
Players take on the role of Angel Sanchez, a human resistance leader, and lead a team of rebels against the oppressive alien regime. The game features stealth-based gameplay, puzzle-solving, and strategic use of different team members to overcome challenges and liberate humanity

name: Freeride
summary: Freeride is a game about YOU. Board a train to the Spirit World in our oddball RPG where you make friends, use telekinesis, find secrets, consume ice cream and chart your own path. Each character is uniquely troubled, and in helping them find their way, you might just find yourself, too.

name: Front Mission 2089-II
summary: Front Mission 2089-II is a tactical role-playing game developed by Square Enix, MSF, and Winds, and was published and released in Japan by Square Enix in 2006 and 2008 for the mobile phones. The game was released on September 15, 2006 and February 21, 2008.

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 5: Last Resort
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 12: Jurassic Jason
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Freelancers: Rogue Skies
summary: FREELANCERS: ROGUE SKIES An open-world single-player space combat roguelite where you pilot customizable starfighters, engage in tactical dogfights, and explore dynamic star systems across a galaxy shaped by war and opportunity.

name: Fried Chicken Wings Cause Love Fires
summary: - Cannibalism X superpowers X Suspense X Original worldview - "Fried Chicken Wings Cause a Love Fire" is a BL mystery comedy long visual novel. It uses the first-person perspective with a fixed protagonist, Aris; contains elements of horror and sexual innuendo.

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Retro Jason
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: From Dusk To Dawn
summary: Construct your symbol combination to generate more defense value until it completely resists the attack of zombies.

name: Frights
summary: A Cute Retro-Style Horror Survival Adventure. After a long day at the Riverside Forest, you wandered far from your parents...too far. Now it's nighttime and you can't seem to find your way back. As you follow the sweet voice of a sheep(?!), you fall inside an old, haunted cavern.

name: Freezer Pops 2: Little Blo's Party
summary: Freezer Pops 2: Little Blo's Party is a visual novel sequel of Freezer Pops. It's a story about Alexandre participating in a famous blogger named Little Blo while he can date other men. It's a product inspired by Brazilian pop culture, especially memes.

name: Frogar.io
summary: Frogar.io is a frogtastic online, mobile action, game where you must eat your way to victory. Play against players from all over the world to become the biggest and baddest frog ever! Have you got what it takes to complete daily quests and top the leaderboards?

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 2013
summary: Franchise Hockey Manager is a hockey sports management game. The player can take control of any team in 19 playable leagues, including NHL, AHL, KHL and many other European elite leagues, as well as North American minor and junior leagues. A team is led to success by managing every aspect of hockey team: roster management, contracts and player trades, coaching, scouting, finances. Furthermore, you can create your own custom league, fill it with your fictional teams and players, set the rules and play.

name: Frog Jump
summary: Jump, climb, push others with your tongue, and reach the top to win the princess's kiss! (Up to 8 Players)

name: Freshly Frosted
summary: Place conveyor belts to solve puzzles in the world's most adorable donut factory!

name: From Flames
summary: From Flames' is an atmospheric, explorative thriller, with horror elements; inspired by David Szymanski's 'Fingerbones', and to a lesser extent: Silent Hill.

name: Frozen Heart
summary:
To bring death and destruction upon this dying world. Drench the land with bodies and flood the rivers with blood. Fill the void of your frozen heart with vibrant colors and infinite beauty caged inside.

It's a megawad composed of short maps, where every map has death exit. Will you find it in your heart?

name: Frauki's Adventure!
summary: Frauki's Adventure is a melee-combat platformer where you fight your way deep into a strange and mysterious world. Challenging sword-fights and a sprawling, bizarre world await!

name: Frog Odyssey
summary: A turn-based strategic auto-battler where you buy ingredients, craft special dishes, and feed them to your frog adventurers to unlock powerful bonuses! Embark on a heroic journey to confront those causing chaos across the realm.

name: Frutigeropolis: The Promised City
summary: Step into a serene, surreal city of the old future. Explore environments shaped by the soul of Frutiger design. Slow down inside a world built to be remembered.

name: Frankenstein: The Dismembered Bride
summary: Frankenstein: The Dismembered Bride is a hidden object game loosely based on the 1818 novel by Mary Shelley and other derivative works. Most of the time, the player has to explore the mansion of Frankenstein, where every room is represented by a static screen. The main objective of each location is to find all the objects listed at the bottom of the screen, and afterward collect one of Janet's body parts. In later stages, the player has to pick up machine parts instead of the bride's pieces. Janet and the machine are gradually assembled on two separate tabs at the left side of the screen showing the game progress. The hint button highlights the position of one of the required items and is unlimited, but takes some time to recharge after use.

name: Frontline: Panzers & Generals Vol. I
summary: Experience the thrill of commanding your army to victory in this exciting Table-top World War II Hex-strategy game. Strategize your way to success by conquering objectives and outsmarting your opponents!

name: Friendly Bunny Mochi
summary: FRIENDLY BUNNY MOCHI is the sequel to LONELY WOLF TREAT. this story follows mochi on her mission to get everyone to be friends... even a fox who's very insistent on eating her for dinner.

name: Friendly Blonding
summary: Friendly Blonding is a linear adult visual novel focused on the themes of netorare (or cheating) and moral degeneration (or corruption). It it a short story told from both the male protagonist's and his girlfriend's perspective.

name: From Fire Emergence
summary: Survive unspeakable nightmares in this third person action-horror. Play as Sergeant Aaron as he answers a distressed call for help deep in the British countryside.Defeat vile demons, solve puzzles, explore & progress in an unrivalled, atmospheric world, whose events, will have you gripped with fear.

name: Frustrain
summary: Frustrain is a surrealistic VR thriller about some bizarre railroad incident. The adventure is focused on its plot and original graphics based on German expressionism movies. Having met his compartment company the character finds himself drawn into a row of some odd incidents. Communicate with passengers and staff, examine your surroundings, investigate to find out the truth about the train and the main character.

name: Frigid VR
summary: Hunt, build, craft and survive an apocalyptic arctic environment and unravel the mystery of a strange virus that is infecting the local wildlife.

name: Free Royale
summary:
Loot, Kill, Surrive.

Welcome to Free Royale. A brand new Free To Play Battle Royale Experiance where the community is in control of the action! Is there something that you always wanted to use? A fish as a melee weapon? Jetpack's that shoot glitter? No clip for a few seconds as a powerup?

Well none of these are (currently) in the game but they could be! This is the game where the community decides what should be in! With custom lobbies, public games and more exciting features to come such as making your own battle royale map that could end up becoming an official map!

Take part in an ever expanding world with new modes, maps, features and even whole graphical redesgins!

Forever Free 2 Play with no monetry actions that would provide a competive advantage ever.

This is only the beginning...

name: Frontline: Assault Corps WW2
summary: A World War II Turn-based Tactical Wargame crafted with passion and care for history and strategy enthusiasts alike.

name: Freaky Clown: Town Mystery
summary: Can you solve the evil mystery of this town and face the freaky clown and his horrors alone? Take on this horror adventure and play and discover the evil plans of the clown.

name: Frogger 2: Swampy's Revenge
summary:
Because of his envy of Frogger's achievements and the attention he receives, Swampy the Crocodile hatches a devious scheme to invade his pond and kidnap Lillie Frog's brothers and sisters. What a vile crocodile! Assuming the role of the vengeful frog, you must thwart the evil crocodile and save the innocent tadpoles from harm.

Divided into various interactive 3D worlds, Frogger's mission spans over 30 levels crammed with life threatening obstacles and monstrous cronies blocking the path to victory. Fortunately, the frog has been endowed with supreme powers including regular hops and super-hops, the ability to float over water and land, a Power Croak for calling missing tadpoles and a bug-seeking tongue.

name: Fractured Soul
summary: Fractured Soul takes the classic platformers of the 80s and doubles the action! Your unique ability to shift between two parallel dimensions allows you to weave through enemy fire, catch opponents by surprise, and leap over impossibly wide gaps by using platforms in both realities.

name: Frozen Shelter
summary: Frozen Shelter is an indie first-person walking simulator game made in realistic 3D graphics. As a location, the player will be presented with a bunker built during the Cold War of the USSR. The fascinating atmosphere of loneliness will put pressure on the player throughout the game.

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 5
summary: Franchise Hockey Manager 5 is the only sports strategy game licensed by the NHL ® , including the real clubs, awards, and trophies associated with the greatest hockey league in the world. FHM 5 allows you to build your hockey franchise into a perennial Stanley Cup winner YOUR way, in the current 2018-19 season or back through the entire history of the sport - all the way back to the very beginning!

name: Freerice
summary: Freerice is an educational trivia game that helps you get smarter while making a difference for people around the world. Every question you answer correctly raises 10 grains of rice for the World Food Programme (WFP) to support its work saving and changing lives around the world.

name: Fragment
summary: Enter the loop, explore abstract spaces, find and process bad memories to unfold your story and learn your fate. Fragment tells a story of generational trauma and addiction, you decide whether to break the loop or be consumed by it.

name: From Fear
summary: From Fear is a 1-4 player survival horror where you choose your fear. In this post-apocalyptic world, you must scavenge to survive with your deepest fear lurking in the shadows. Do not believe everything you see.

name: Fruitcraft
summary: Fruitcraft Trading Card Game is a massively multiplayer online collectible card game app on mobile, with fruit warriors. All that means is that you can collect over 200 trading cards, challenge opponents globally and band with your friends to form tribes. The game combines elements from online strategy games such as Travian or Clash of Clans with traditional trading card games

name: Frogmageddon
summary:
Fight hordes of the evil snake army as one, several, dozens, hundreds of frogs, each with unique abilities and quirks. Frogmageddon is a bullet hell survival game where you flip the script of survival gameplay and become the horde yourself! Can you make it to 100 frogs and defeat the evil tyranny of King Snek?

Initially made for the GMTK 2024 Game Jam, the Steam version includes controller support, achievements, new game modes, new frogs, and much more!

name: FrankenStorm TD
summary: FrankenStorm is a mazing roguelite tower defense. You are a humble scientist, besieged by endless hordes of angry peasants. Salvage parts to build towers, set traps, acquire upgrades and construct an elaborate maze. Be vigilant or these wily foes will use your own tricks against you!

name: Frostliner
summary: The moon shattered. The world froze. Take command of a nomadic train city hurtling through a war-ravaged frozen wasteland. In this survival city builder on rails, gather survivors, scavenge resources, and do whatever it takes to keep the engine running and stay ahead of the frost.

name: FrankenStorm TD: Prologue
summary: Roguelite TD: all towers & enemies start the same, but you have 1 choice per wave affecting BOTH and stacking up for dramatic variance. Gradually salvage and make some choices permanent to build deeper strategies. Also a unique mazing challenge where wires and towers must be linked to a power source

name: From By
summary: From by is a simple third person action adventure game where players need to transform into various animals, evade danger and improve their skills in an environment full of mechanisms, and ultimately complete the competition to win.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Dearest Double Date
summary: On a lovely friday night, Boyfriend and Girlfriend are taking a break in GF's bedroom. Unfortunately, the Dearest family knows all... Does BF really know what he's in for?

name: Frontier Pilot Simulator
summary: Frontier pilots simulator is a environment centered single player vehicle sim combining skill-based flying system with a story-driven economic progression system. Your piloting expertise will be constantly challenged by the world while it unfolds before you. Each contract has multiple routes and players will be the ones to decide what kind of experience they get.

name: Frontiers
summary: Frontiers is a game about collecting items, dodging bullets, and beating up robots. Inspired primarily by action RPGs of the 90's, Frontiers cranks it up to 110 percent by emphasizing combat and high paced action to swiftly and methodically take out your enemies.

name: Frostpunk: 1886
summary: The original Frostpunk experience is being reimagined and expanded with new events, mechanics, and laws within a new Purpose Path. Return to your role as the ruler of Earth's last city, manage its citizens, weigh up your choices and ensure your society's survival.

name: Fresh Story
summary: Fresh Story is a visual novel about one girl's difficult journey. She will face difficulties and hard decisions to achieve a peaceful life as she dreamed.Diana came from the suburbs to the big city to achieve success and a happy life with her boyfriend Vlad.

name: Freight Simulator
summary:
Transport cargo throughout the country, face the problems of everyday life, and receive the best rewards.

Coordinate cargo transportation and earn money for freight
Choose the best trucks and buckets at the dealership and make your garage the best way for you and your company.
Hire and control your employees and have the best people at your side to help the company grow.
Manage your properties and expand your business.
Control your finances and invest your surplus money in the bank, or in difficult times try to get a loan from the bank manager.
Buy and sell shares on the stock exchange.
Connect with other players online via chat and online market.
Participate in online ranking competitions
Manage your own life, with your needs

Be a transportation entrepreneur, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, invest and expand!

Success is a few trips away, are you ready?

Deal closed!

name: Freefall '95
summary: Fast paced, arcade-like, 90’s inspired action packed fun! Play as a passenger on board a doomed flight stuck in a twisted time loop in the year 1995. Explore a wild time-bending narrative while stacking up trick combos, collecting items, earning coins, upgrading abilities and dodging debris!

name: Fran Bow Chapter 5
summary: Fran Bow is a creepy adventure game that tells the story of Fran, a young girl struggling with a mental disorder and an unfair destiny.

name: Frontline: World At War
summary: Victory awaits those who can adapt and seize the upper hand in this thrilling war game. Can you reshape history and lead your forces to glory?

name: Fractal Odyssey
summary: Fractal Odyssey is a tactical RPG about forging freedom. Guide a party of rebels to slay a dragon god and topple a tyrannical Decree. They will cross frozen wastes, enter ephemeral dreams, and face unbreakable foes. They will fall, and they will die. You must carve their future.

name: Frustration Factory
summary: Frustration Factory is an asset management puzzle game requiring concentration, patience and thinking ahead. Each level will challenge you to carefully direct game pieces down an increasingly complex series of conveyor belts to eventually assemble and ship finished products to waiting customers.

name: Friendship with Benefits 2
summary: Arcadia has changed, but its gorgeous ponies haven’t. In this eroge, explore a new world, unlock over 40+ explicit scenes, and romance 25+ unique girls—all eager to share their deepest desires with you. Where will you begin in this new world?

name: Fragile Reflection
summary: A young woman returns back to her home in a rural Japanese village - but something is very wrong. Find items, solve puzzles, fight monsters and traverse between dimensions. Help Kario Ito reveal hidden mysteries and stay alive in this retro-styled survival horror!

name: Frenetika
summary: Cast spells against the skeletal servants of Osso in this dark fantasy action-roguelike auto-shooting FPS. Featuring a striking comic book visual style and dungeon-synth soundtrack by Witch Bolt.

name: Freetown Forest
summary: Come visit scenic Freetown Forest, home of the famous Profile Rock and Wampanoag reservation! And for you spooky thrill seekers come take our ghost tour and maybe feel a creepy dark presence that lurk in these dark woods. Do not feed the deer. -Massachusetts Office of Travel and Tourism.

name: FR3DD-Y2 p1223-R1a
summary:
FR3DD-Y2 p1223-R1a is a visual novel FNaF x VA11 Hall-A fangame, created for the Fangames at Freddit's gamejam event.

You play as a potential new pizza-tender for Freddy's Pizzeria going through your first day on the job; getting used to the restaurant and its odd staff, cooking various types of pizza to serve to hungry customers, and having inane conversations with whoever sits in front of your station. The game takes the gameplay and style of VA11 Hall-A and mixes it with FNaF characters and pizza-making inside a Freddy's restaurant.

name: Fruit Box
summary: Fruit Box is a Web Game made in HTML5 where you drag the mouse to highlight a group of apples that add up to ten, try to get as many points as you can before the time runs out.

name: Freeride Earth
summary: Here is the video game “Freeride Earth”! Released in 2000 on Windows, it's still available and playable with some tinkering. It's a sports game, set in a snowboarding / skiing theme.

name: Frutiger Home
summary: Decorate your dream frutiger home in this cozy co-op frutiger house decorating game. Pick a home layout, add from a wide range of frutiger-themed decor and hang out with your friends!

name: Fragment
summary: FRAGMENT is a pixel-art speedrunner where grenade launcher is your dash.

name: Freud's Bones: The Game
summary: Freud's Bones is the first point&click narrative-driven game to pay homage to the birth of psychoanalysis and its founder, addressing the themes of sexuality and neuroses filled with existential doubts.

name: Frogs
summary: Frogs is a clicker game where you tap to collect a variety of frogs. You can obtain them every 2 hours or unlock unique ones from chests that you can obtain by clicking. Equip frogs to boost your score, trade them in the marketplace, and just collect them all. Dive into this adventure with us!

name: Fracture
summary: FRACTURE is a top-down 3D space shooter RPG, blending open-world exploration and fragmented memory-driven storytelling.It throws you into a recursive war shaped by identity, consciousness, and fate.You haven't come here for the first time—But are you sure... you've ever truly left?

name: Fright Light
summary: Experience an intense, strategy dependent game disguised as a cheesy parody of all those jump scare "games" we love to laugh at. Master the art of tracking up to four intruders at once along with timing your flashlight reloads for maximum protection from your enemies. Defeat the game to unlock an infinite number of bonus levels to really test your skills.

name: Freeway Fury
summary: Stuck in traffic? Don't let that stop you! Jump between cars and switch vehicles at anytime in this fast-paced arcade racer. Do crazy stunts for extra points and nitro boost! Tilt to steer and press the nitro button for extra speed. Tap anywhere on the screen to jump in that direction. Land on vehicles to take control of them, or else you're roadkill! Reach the next checkpoint before the time ends! So what are you waiting for? Release your fury!!!

name: Frog Ball Rerolled
summary: Collect pineapples as you roll your way to victory in Frog Ball Rerolled! Frog Ball Rerolled is a deluxe version of Frog Ball, a marble-rolling game with charming characters and precise controls. With over 35 full levels and over 1,400+ customization options, you'll never get bored!

name: Front Mission Evolved: Wanzer Pack 3
summary:
Smash the competition with a wanzer evolved from the Front Mission franchise's past (Wildgoat) and 1 brand-new type (ISV-Prototype).

NOTE: There are numbering differences between the Japanese and English releases for the same content. Japanese stores released as "Wanzer Pack 2", while western stores released as "Wanzer Pack 3".

name: Frost Heart
summary: Defeat the boss! Melt his heart... with your sword!

name: Franny Answers
summary: A retake of the classic Magic Eight Ball, this time with Franny the dog in charge. Ask her your yes or no questions, and see what she says. Try giving her a treat to improve her mood.

name: Friday Night Funkin' D-Sides
summary:
Get funky once more in yet another remix mod. The minds of DastardlyDeacon, PhilipLol, Fifleo and gc present a brand new take on the same ol' story: Friday Night Funkin': D-SIDES

You know the deal. This mod features the whole nine:

- Bangin' remixes.
- Entirely new designs.
- Brand new sprites and icons redrawn from scratch.
- Unique backgrounds and settings.
- Mechanics!
- ORIGINAL SONGS for every 2nd week.
- Unique HUD and UI.
- Mod crossovers!
- thats about it but danm isnt that a lot

Your life is on the line, all for you to date the girl you love. You got what it takes?

name: Free Chess: Nuts n Bolts Set
summary:
For all you mechanics and welders who love to make things from stuff that doesn't conventionally look like what your making, well this isn't really for you, it's more for those who love the creations that you make!
The rustic scrap metal art style is here for all who enjoy it!
This DLC includes:
-6 Unique Chess Pieces.

name: From The Forgotten
summary: From the Forgotten is an action-driven multiplayer PvP game that fuses bio-mechs and firearms to deliver visceral combat with tactical depth. Become The Aberrantus—a warrior bonded to a living war machine—and brave brutal trials alongside teammates in high-stakes battles.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Kapi - Arcade Showdown
summary: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Kapi - Arcade Showdown is a mod by PaperKitty that adds 3 new weeks, new opponents, and a bunch of new songs. The main focus of the mod is of the character, Kapi.

name: Frightwood
summary: Frightwood is a visual novel created over the course of a month for the Spooktober VN Game Jam 2021. This story is a spooky prequel to Lovewood .

name: Friendship Dungeon: Party Puzzler
summary: Friendship Dungeon: Party Puzzler is a dungeon crawler where puzzles meet chaos! Grab your friends (up to 4-player co-op) and dive into a roguelite dungeon where every room is a unique tile-swapping puzzle packed with traps, monsters, and treasures. Will your friendships survive the dungeon?

name: Fruit am I?
summary: This is a game for Weekly Game Jam 249 and the subject is Mysterious Fruit.

name: Fritz 6
summary:
Fritz 6 is a chess simulation which can be adjusted for beginners, advanced players and professionals. In comparison to Fritz 5 its graphics were revised and the menu got improved.

For beginners the game features several help functions, e.g. it explains all possible moves. When making a mistake the virtual coach comes up and helps. For advanced players there are many settings for the AI opponent to get the ideal training partner. The key parts of the programme are the extensive analysis functions. The database consists of 320.000 professional games and has an ELO rating of 2825.

name: Fragsurf
summary: Fragsurf is a dynamic blend of multiplayer first-person shooter PvP, strafing, surfing, and bunnyhop, allowing players to engage in high-speed maneuvers and combat.

name: Frogger
summary: A remake and reimagining of Frogger. However, unlike the original game, most of the maps are more complex and require exploration. In each level, the player must collect five baby frogs within a certain amount of time. There are various obstacles, traps, and enemies which must be avoided and usually are unique to a certain zone. There are a total of 33 levels spread out across nine different zones.

name: Fresh Tracks
summary: Jump, dodge, and fight to the rhythm of the gods in this thrilling music-action game on skis. Take on obstacles and menacing enemies as you ski further into the darkness that has befallen the snow-covered land of Norwyn.

name: Froggy Brews
summary: Froggy Brews is a gentle narrative puzzle adventure, where you play as a tea-loving frog returning to your old neighborhood — it has changed over time, and so have you. You brew delicious tea, try to connect with unfamiliar faces, and help others heal as you rediscover your place in this world.

name: Frostpoint Toll
summary: A machine of war, repurposed for labor. Frostpoint Toll is an action roguelike about mining, collecting, and letting go. Because here, moving forward means learning to forgive.

name: From Ivan
summary:
TO: HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGER (HRM) 
FROM: BRANCH OPERATIONS SUPERIOR SUPERVISOR (BOSS) 
 
Hello IVAN 
 
As our new Human Resources Manager, your job is to manage our human resources, which means picking out the best greeting card to send people on the many occasions when sending a greeting card is appropriate. Studies show that distributing appropriate cards has a significant impact on the mood, productivity, and long-term outcomes. Do not take this responsibility lightly. 
 
From Ivan is a short branching narrative game where you control the story indirectly by sending mail to your friends, family, and coworkers. It was created by Sean Bouchard, Martzi Campos, and Will Campos. Music by Kyle Laporte.

name: FriendOS
summary: FriendOS is a singleplayer/online bullet-hell RPG set within a virus-infected computer. Customize your Friend and team up with others to fish, socialize, and explore the depths of a dying operating system.

name: Freeway Fury 3
summary: Freeway Fury 3 is an arcade-style flash game where players race against time by jumping between vehicles on a busy highway, avoiding traffic, and completing missions across multiple levels.

name: Fractal Space: Pocket Edition
summary: Live the memorable adventure of Fractal Space, an immersive 3D first person adventure and puzzle game in a beautiful science-fiction universe! Will you solve the mysteries of this space station and get out alive? This, my friend, is up to you...

name: FrontWars
summary:
FrontWars.io is a large-scale, multiplayer real-time strategy game where players battle for global dominance on a single massive map. Start with a small territory and expand through conquest, diplomacy, and resource management. Construct cities, fortify your defenses, trade with allies, and unleash devastating bombs to tip the balance of power.

Victory requires more than brute force—tactical decision-making and cooperation are key to survival. Every match is a high-stakes struggle for control, where only the most strategic players will rise to claim the world as their own.

name: Friendship Simulator
summary: Experience old school couch split-screen gaming as if you had friends.

name: Fracta Regna
summary: Fracta Regna is a short tactical-strategy experience where you must conquer territories by fight enemy points of interest.

name: Frostpunk 2
summary: Frostpunk 2 is the sequel to the highly acclaimed, BAFTA-nominated society survival game. The age of steam has passed and now, oil leads the way as humanity’s newest salvation. However, with new threats on the horizon, the future of the city looks even grimmer than before.

name: From The Void
summary: Command a fleet of customizable spaceships, go through intense battles and create builds with unique synergies. Think your placements and upgrades as they will shape the fleet's fate and determines victory or defeat. Test your strategic skills in this rogue-like autobattler game.

name: Frontline Command
summary: Frontline Command is a tactical auto-battler where you control a squad of soldiers through intense missions in a modern military setting. Use strategy and combat skills to outsmart tough opponents as you navigate challenging battlefield scenarios.

name: Frenzy Islands
summary: The cruise ship has sunk — just the perfect vacation, right?

name: Free Ninja
summary: Free Ninja: Endless Run is a thrilling endless runner where you dive into the world of ninjas! Choose between the Ninja (male) or Shinobi (female), customize your appearance, and get ready to run through environments filled with obstacles and challenges.

name: Fray Fight
summary: Fray Fight is free! Battle the evil hordes on your way to Valhalla. Annihilate thousands of monsters with overpowered attacks and upgrades.

name: Free Chess: Soviet Set
summary: 1950s Soviet Latvian Chess Set

name: Freight Tycoon Inc.
summary: Freight Tycoon is an economic simulation game which challenges players’ management skills. It puts one into the shoes of an owner of a cargo transportation company. One has to evaluate the profitability of contracts, contact customers, and appoint drivers to deliver goods.

name: From Warrior to Hero
summary: An IDLE role-playing game

name: Fritz Chess 16: Steam Edition
summary: When is chess the most enjoyable? When you win! When Fritz entered his first tournaments some 25 years ago, humans still had a real chance of taking the engine down. Only a few years down the line, Fritz was already beating grandmasters left, right and center, but ever since his 4:2 victory over Kramnik in 2006, Fritz has been considered unbeatable. Who would want to play against him? In the case of Fritz 16, however, playing against an engine is now once again the very definition of fun! A host of features, including "Assisted Analysis", which gives you discreet visual hints as you move, and emoticons, which show Fritz’s mood, are there to help you. Even with little knowledge of chess, you can enjoy many an exciting game, and more importantly, victory, against Fritz. If things don’t work out, Fritz 16 shows you the combinations you might have missed directly after the game with the handy “Tactical Analysis” function, or you can dive right into "Easy Play" calculation training to hone your skills. Fritz doesn’t come up short when it comes to playing strength either: the new multiprocessor engine was developed by star programmer Vas Rajlich ("Rybka") and is up there with the global elite.

name: Fritz Chess 16: Steam Edition
summary: When is chess the most enjoyable? When you win! When Fritz entered his first tournaments some 25 years ago, humans still had a real chance of taking the engine down.
