summary: Welcome to the juicy world of Fruity Puzzler, where vibrant colors and brain-teasing challenges collide! Dive into a refreshing gaming experience that will tantalize your senses and stimulate your mind.

name: Frontline Defense
summary: Simple early flash tower defense game with effortful scaling.

name: Freaky Panties V: I Love Penguins
summary: Freaky Panties V is a map done entirely in Linux using only the Eureka level editor for mapping.

name: Freezeframe
summary: You find yourself locked inside a museum with just your camera. Explore the various exhibits, complete puzzles, find all the keys to unlock the museums overly-secure front door and escape. If you can.

name: Frogger: The Great Quest
summary: The object of the game is to lead Frogger across The Third Kingdom which is filled with evil creatures and insects in search of the Princess of his wishes. There are many user interactions in the game that gives hints and tips on how to complete each level.

name: Frop
summary: Join Frop as he adventures through mountains, dungeons, and many other places. What's happening in the Kingdom? What's this dark essence? This game will have you solving puzzles, learning spells, battling in a turn based manner, and crafting.

name: Frogs In Love
summary: Frogs In Love is a casual mixed puzzle game developed by Boomzap and published across different game portals such as Big Fish Games, Wild Tangent, iPlay.

name: Frag: Pro Shooter - The Sniper & Specialist Heroes Pack
Free Throw
summary:
A simple game in which you only have to click the screen with your mouse.
There are several unique levels.

name: Frozen Mystery
summary: Frozen Mystery is a Christmas puzzle that will help you to relax, immerse yourself in the festive atmosphere and at the same time train your brains!

name: FreedroidRPG
summary:
The game tells the story of a world destroyed by a conflict between robots and their human masters. Play as Tux in a quest to save the world from the murderous rebel bots who know no mercy. You get to choose which path you wish to follow, and freedom of choice is everywhere in the game.

FreedroidRPG features a real time combat system with melee and ranged weapons, fairly similar to the proprietary game Diablo. There is an innovative system of programs that can be run in order to take control of enemy robots, alter their behavior, or improve one's characteristics. You can use over 50 different kinds of items and fight countless enemies on your way to your destiny. An advanced dialog system provides story background and immersive role playing situations.

The game is complete, fully playable, and can provide about 10 hours of fun. It is still being actively developed, and help is welcome in many areas. People having - or trying to acquire - programming, map editing, or writing skills will find FreedroidRPG to be an exciting, fast-moving project in which they can fully express their creativity.

name: Fractal Sailor
summary:
Fractal Sailor is an experimental, atmospheric horror tech demo where you take the role of a lone sailor navigating a hovercraft through a dark and mystic fractal environment. Your objective is to refuel and reactivate abandoned stations that have collected rare resources from these fractals.

However, you are not alone...

Survive for as long as possible and immerse yourself in this chilling experience!

name: Freudian Slipgate 2
summary:
Taking place after the events of the first Freudian Slipgate, our tale follows the eponymous Guy of Doom as he struggles to reconcile with what transpired over the course of those twenty-two maps of Oedipally-charged madness.
Freudian Slipgate 2 is a 'classic' 32 map megawad meant to be a sendoff to the good ol` Boom, as we approach the new age of MBF21 and the fancy gzdoom indie games.

name: FreeInfantry
summary: Isometric. Massively Multiplayer. Capture The Flag. Skirmish. Bug Hunt. And more. Welcome to FreeInfantry - the world's first massive multiplayer online isometric shooter.

name: Fruit Adventure
summary: Help Super Strawberry become the bravest Fruit in the Healthy Forest!

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 2014
summary: The 2014 entry in the Hockey managing sim series.

name: Frostbite
summary: You're an Eskimo who wants to build an igloo to live in during the cold season. To do this, you must jump from ice-block to ice-block, while avoiding wildlife such as birds and crabs. Coming with contact with any of these will cause them to push you off the block and into the deadly water. Once you have built your igloo, you must enter it to proceed to the next level. Remember, you must build it before the temperature drops to 0°. You have four lives.

name: Friction
summary:
Friction is a light-gun shooting game where players must navigate through three challenging levels full of varied gameplay and enemies. The 3D rail shooter is the first game developed by newly formed Friction Game Studios.

There are over 14 different enemies to shoot your way through, each with varied attack behaviours, as well as unique transforming bosses with special attacks to overcome. To keep things interesting, the game features fully destructible level geometry, a variety of different weapons and powerups, and realistic physics and motion captured character animations.

name: Freed Software
summary: Freesoft is an IT company simulator. You have to build your own IT empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best software in the game world.

name: Frog Out!
summary: Frog Out! is a wacky local multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. It's time for you and your friends to find out who is the slickest and the craftiest frog in the pond. Channel your inner frog and jump to victory!

name: Fractal Fly
summary: Explore imaginary landscapes, like you're flying in another world. Observe and dive into those chaotic shapes all around you. And even transform them! You're totally free to move where you want, you will discover a tremendous variety of shapes and colors!

name: Frightened Pixels 2
summary: Frightened Pixels 2 is an indie horror game that features a voxel/pixelated art-style. It is set to release in 2016.

name: Fruit Machine Simulator
summary: A simulation of a fruit machine for multiple platforms.

name: Froggy Quest
summary: Help Froggy complete a quest in this colorful platformer adventure! Use your sticky tongue to pull, push, and grapple through many challenging levels while collecting as many flies as you can.

name: Fruit Party: Suika Casual Puzzle
summary: A fun and challenging match puzzle game where you have to match colorful fruits to make them bigger!

name: Freedom: How I Escaped
summary: This is your chance. The time has come to put oppression in your past. The escape plan is ready, but you must avoid all surveillance and run undetected. Its time to make your own path. To make your own future. Its now or never.

name: Froggin' Around
summary: A little frog in a little pond eatin' bugs, takin' naps, and just froggin' around.

name: Frankenstein: The Monster Returns
summary: For years the monster lay in the grave, and the villagers went peacefully about their business trying to forget the horrible nightmare days when HE had spread terror throughout the countryside. For years the sun seemed to shine brighter and the crops grew taller than anyone could ever remember. Surely, their troubles were far behind them, and life was one blissful long walk through paradise. But, their wonderful world would be shattered in one mighty flash from the heavens. For lightning had struck the old tombstone that lay battered and overgrown with weeds in a dark corner of the ancient cemetary. And just as fiendish life had once been given to the dead, it would be given again. First a twitch of a finger, a flutter of a heartbeat, then a powerful surge of energy to the twisted criminal brain that so long ago had terrorized the land in the powerful body of the hideous monster. The horror was about to begin again... Frankenstein had risen from the dead!

name: Fractal Factory
summary: factory puzzle game

name: Froglet
summary: Froglet is a 1-player Frogger clone. The player controls a frog that moves in cardinal directions, trying to cross two busy highways with cars traveling in opposite directions. The roads are separated by a river with moving lily pads that the frog must hop across. There are six homes at the top of the screen that the player tries to position their frog into. The player starts with five lives, and the game restarts if all are used.

name: Frozen Drift Race
summary: Gain experience and become the king of heavy snow drift under harsh snowy weather conditions.

name: Frontier Hunter: Erza's Wheel of Fortune - Fashion
summary: This packs several new costumes to the game.

name: Frontier Gate Boost+
summary: Frontier Gate Boost+ is a Role-Playing game, developed by Tri-Ace and published by Konami. While originally released in 2011, the game saw the released of an improved version known as Boost + in 2013.

name: Froyo Taxi
summary: Drive your taxi, pickup a passenger, drop them to their destination and earn money.

name: Free Will
summary: Free Will is a 2D psychological puzzle RPG where the puzzles happen outside of the game. Dig deep into the system code to fix the corruption, and uncover information that might be better off hidden.

name: Frontier Hunter: Weapon Package
summary: In order to protect novices, the following weapons and equipment are provided: Taidao Silver Snow S, Gatlin - Red Flame S and Double Blades - Determination S

name: Frenzy VR
summary: Frenzy VR is a game full of mayhem and destruction. You are placed inside carefully constructed environments where you can go mad and be free to do what you please in a world without consequences. A VR game where all objects can be a weapon, with the added bonus of having satisfying destruction physics. Ever dreamed of hitting your best friend in the face with a toaster? Probably not, but now I mentioned it I bet you want to try it!

name: Frostbiter
summary: Can you survive Frostbiter and escape his snowy maze of horror? Use snowballs to defend yourself, find your way in the maze, try to escape, and most important of all: don't let him catch you!

name: Fragile Soul
summary: Difficult rogue-like dungeon crawler

name: Freon
summary: Freon is a hotseat cooperative shooter made in retro style. Enjoy with your friends and family members.

name: Free Afternoon
summary: you have a free afternoon and you just want to play your video game

name: Friday Night Funkin' B-Side Remixes
summary:
Remixes the games music and gives the visuals a fresh coat of paint.

Welcome to the new and improved version of B-Side Remixes:
B-Side Redux
The initial release of B-Side Redux includes Weeks 1, 2, and 7, the Tutorial, along with all of the original content from B-Sides classic.

name: Freestyle Studio
summary: Rap battle others, practice your freestyling skills, advance in the rapping community. Freestyle Studio is a fun way to practice your rapping skills, whether that be alone or against others.

name: Front Page Sports: Ski Racing
summary: Blast down world class mountain slopes at speeds averaging 80 MPH in this 3D ski racing computer game from 1997.

name: Frantic Fred
summary:
Help a hilarious bear named 'Frantic Fred' to eat all the apples that falling from the tree and avoiding them hit the ground, while dodging anvils that throw the naughty squirrels to win many tickets!.

If you catch all apples, will go to the bonus round, where you can win up to 500 tickets.

name: Frog X Log
summary: In Frog X Log, you must catch as many fly's as possible with your abnormally long tongue until a inevitable fatal mistake. Each Fly is colour coded and in turn, must be caught with the right colour of tongue. One out of three colours is picked every 30 seconds which triggers a tongue colour change, for every 10 Fly's picked, the difficulty spikes along with a few surprises. However, if you happen to catch a fly with the wrong colour, you will trigger a game over and a potential froggy explosion. Simplistic controls are all that are required, arrow keys to move and the space-bar to temporarily freeze and stick out your tongue.

name: Franklin's Great Adventures
summary: Franklin the Turtle is off with his friends in the summer embarking on new adventures and meeting new friends. Franklin's Great Adventures is an adventure game with light puzzles.

name: Frog Familiar
summary:
Explore a tranquil and mysterious forest while you gather ingredients for a witch's potion.

In this game you play as a little frog who works for a kindly witch. In order for the witch to brew a new potion, you must wander around the forest gathering herbs, mushrooms, and other items. Along the way you will meet a variety of humans, critters, and spirits, some of who could use your help! Can you find all of the items for the potion, including a rare magical crystal?

name: Frozen Hearth
summary: Frozen Hearth is a Real-Time Strategy game, blended with exciting RPG features to create a new experience for lovers of RTS games. Set in our own unique, Dark-Fantasy world-setting, you can play alone, or co-operatively with a friend, through an epic and brutal campaign. Taking on the role of a powerful Avatar of the heroic, individualistic Danaan; you will try to save them from certain extinction at the hands of an immense horde of ravenous ice monsters – known as the Shangur –driven ever forward by an unstoppable wave of moving ice and snow that consumes everything it shrouds.

name: Friendship
summary:
Risa, a typical middle schooler, pays her friend, Mio, a visit. She rings the doorbell to her house but gets no response. Just as Risa was about to head home, she hears her friend's voice calling out "Help me..."

One person's memories and manuscripts, themed around the importance of friendship.

name: Front Mission
summary:
A DS Port of the 2003 Remake "Front Mission 1st"

The Nintendo DS version features battle sequences that make use of the console's dual screen setup for an easy view of the action.[16] The port also includes a number of new additions. A number of characters from other Front Mission titles were added to the game's storyline, such as Griff Burnam and Glen Duval. New parts and weapons from other Front Mission entries were added. This version also boasted nine secret missions that further expanded the storyline.

name: Frogvale
summary: The same day that Marco was fired, he found out that he'll be a father. The only job he can get for the time being is as a bus driver. Manage his passengers, money and relationships to ensure his family's future.

name: Fractured Dreams
summary:
"You can't ignore them forever."

Fractured Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You explore the dreams of James, and collect effects and tapes in his subconscious.

name: Frostory
summary: A story driven pixel art action adventure game.

name: Frogger 2
summary: Frogger 2 is an extension of the original Frogger, making the levels containing the usual highways and rivers vertically scrolling, with limited side scrolling. Along the way from the bottom to the top of the level, you can collect gems and extra lives, and each level usually has one or more restart points. Along the way, your frog encounters and older, wiser frog called Tadius, who offers advice on strategy.

name: FreeChicken
summary: A 3D adventure single-player game for freedom! Test your agility to avoid traps and obstacles as you embark on a journey for freedom! Don't worry, there's a game save function, so start playing right away! Our game supports both English and Korean.

name: Frog!
summary: Go and have a challenge!! Meet the Frog from the pond. He need to collect all those stars to turn himself into a prince.

name: Frisbee For Fun
summary: Frisbee is joy, frisbee is fun! You are a very mischievous kitten that uses helpless chickens as targets.

name: Freeway Nightmare
summary: Freeway Nightmare - A 2D game with an overhead view, the protagonist runs forward in his dream, wielding various guns, which can be improved over time by collecting materials from killed enemies. More enemies and obstacles appear as you progress!

name: From Beneath
summary: From Beneath is a horror game for mobile devices.

name: Freedom March: Rebel Leader
summary:
Time has come. Start the revolution!
Seems like the authorities forgot who they are. Your rebel soul can't take this anymore.
Gather other people together and lead them to the freedom. Gain influence on your fellow-thinkers to successfully change the nation and win over the system!

name: FrostFire: Battle Frenzy
summary: This is FrostFire -Battle Frenzy-, a 2D anime fighting game perfect for new and experienced players of the genre.

name: Freeman
summary: Freeman - Immersive sim shooter in Sci-fi setting. Chased by pursuers, without a penny behind his back, but with fire in his eyes! Destroy enemies on planets and in space, travel, save friends and punish enemies!

name: Frisky Tom
summary: Game Boy port of Frisky Tom.

name: Freight Hopper
summary: A fast paced platformer where you jump from train to train!

name: Frostfall
summary: A deadly pandemic leaves you suddenly stranded in the arctic north with no way home. With enough supplies for just a few days, you must venture out into the unforgiving cold, and embrace the unknown.

name: Frontera
summary: Frontera is a fantasy city builder and colony sim where you start with a small camp at the edge of a dark forest. Build up your settlement and economy to attract more settlers. Form a military to clear the forest, and claim it for yourself!

name: Friday
summary:
You are helping Robinson, who came ashore on your island, fight against many hazards. At the beginning, Robinson is not very skillful. With each fight he wins you will improve his abilities, but defeats are also helping to get rid off of his worse habits. However, life on the island is energy-sapping, so that Robinson not only gains experiences during his time there, but also starts aging and tends to get clumsy.
In this game, Robinson is represented as a card stack of different behaviors. You are forced to improve this card stack, so you can collect the cards at the end of the game to give Robinson the best chance to win against the tough pirates!

name: Fruit Ninja Kinect
summary: An arcade style game where the player must chop fruit with their hands and feet while avoiding bombs. A Kinect-required XBLA version of the original iOS release.

name: Free Balling
summary: Why not testy it out?

name: Frostbite Express
summary: A train level inspired by Build Engine vehicle levels (see Blood E1M3) and The Polar Express (movie).

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Hex
summary: What's this? Your Girlfriend's father is making an award show and you're invited? Seems like nothing can go wrong! Besides that, a familiar face appears. It's Hex! Your robotic lookin' fella from before seems to have a performance scheduled during the event and he asks for your help. With the whole country watching you, people you fought before, and your Girlfriend, there's no way you could lose!

name: Friday Night Wumpin' vs. Crash
summary: Woah, what weird experiment did Cortex do this time ? Crash has yet again found himself on N.Sanity Beach, but this time, there's two unfamiliar faces that greet him !

name: Frost Bite
summary: A horror game set in snowy mountains at night

name: Frogy World
summary: Frogy World is a 2D platformer game.

name: Fruit Frenzy
summary:
Fruit Frenzy is a one of a kind unique experience for all match 3 game lovers.
Journey through 100 levels with brand new game modes to help save your fruity friends as you battle to defeat the vicious veggies.

name: Free Hugs Inc.
summary: Free Hugs Inc. is about hugging to make others happy. Emotional Repair is needed! People are getting more upset and you must share free hugs around to make them happy once more. Be careful that not everyone wants to be hugged, but the positive energy of a nearby hug can make them more open to receive it.

name: Freshman Year
summary: Freshman Year is a vignette game about an ordinary night in the life a college freshman named Nina. Nina's best friend Jenna invites her to meet up at a local bar with some classmates. Jenna is sort of flaky though, so Nina has to navigate the party by herself. You play as Nina, texting with her friend Jenna as you mingle, dance, drink and wait.

name: Fruit Clicker
summary: Clicking has never been more fun with Fruit Clicker! Low on space? Bored? Then Fruit Clicker is the right game for you! Click fruit and achievements which reveal the game's backstory. Buy upgrades to become an efficient clicker. Eat fruit all day long! Play Fruit Clicker now!

name: Fragment's Moonrise
summary: Fragment's Moonrise is a randomly-generated, open-world Real Time Strategy game, emphasizing skill based and micro-management oriented RTS-style gameplay.

name: Freya's Potion Shop
summary: Freya finally opened the potion shop of her dream! But Freya’s mother used Freya’s debt as an excuse to offer her body to Freya’s creditor, Mr. Manji. To save Mr. Manji from Freya’s mother’s grasp, Freya was determined to pay Mr. Manji back as soon as possible.

name: Fruit Farmer
summary: Build your incredible farm! Create upgrades, get resources, create new types of fruits, sell what you have collected or create products from it! Explore an open world with lots of puzzles! Be the best farmer!

name: Froggy
summary: FROGGY is a game based very loosely on Frogger. You need to move around Armageddon Highway while eating butterflies and avoiding cars and crashes.

name: Freeze! 2: Brothers
summary:
Many years ago, our old hero from "Freeze!“ was kidnapped from evil aliens and locked in a tiny cell on a planet far, far away. He never found his way back.

Now his little brother heads to the stars in his self-built rocket to find his lost brother and to free him from the clutches of the aliens!

You’ll solve twisted physics-based puzzles by rotating the cells around our heroes with your finger. And of course you’ll have to use the Freeze-buttons to arrest gravity for the brothers. Sounds simple? Well, yes, it is - at first.

The basic gameplay is the same as in „Freeze!“, but there are many exciting extensions: In the levels you’ll encounter liquids like water and deadly rocket fuel sloshing around. The brothers have to pass most levels together, fighting against lethal electric fields, smart batteries (what?!?) and slightly sadistic level design.

name: Fractured Space
summary: Fractured Space is a 5-v-5 team-based space combat game. Control your gigantic capital ship to seize mines and bases for team resources and buffs. The intensity of a shooter combines with deep tactical decision making as you battle over five sectors to finally capture the enemy team's home

name: Frayed Knights: The Skull of S'makh-Daon
summary: Frayed Knights: The Skull of S'makh-Daon is a 3D indie computer RPG for Windows featuring turn-based combat, old-school sensibilities, and a story of high adventure and comedy. Who says RPGs have to be so serious?

name: FreeJack
summary: An MMORPG parkour racing game that was shut down.

name: Frog
summary: Try to get your frog from one side of the road, over the river and into your home.

name: Frederic 2: Evil Strikes Back
summary: Defeat famous opponents in musical duels. Immerse yourself in the fantastic story of Frederic's endeavours. Catch all the Easter Eggs and subtle parodies hidden in the background. Practice your skills until perfection and become the Master of the Piano.

name: From the Deep
summary: A Seeker recalled to an abandoned Monastery on the Cosmic Shoreline. A cosmic evil lying in wait. Explore, investigate, and survive by channeling the psychic powers of the Cosmic Waters in this first-person, survival horror game.

name: Freaky Flyers
summary: Freaky Flyers is an air racing video game developed internally by Midway San Diego for Xbox and PS2 while the GameCube version was developed by Point of View, Inc. and published by Midway Games.

name: Frogger's Journey: The Forgotten Relic
summary: In Frogger's Adventure: Forgotten Relic, join Frogger on a fun-filled journey as he travels across diverse worlds, searches for clues and avoids fierce foes. Featuring Frogger's Famous "hop-and-dodge" style gameplay, this game is designed to please players of all ages. There are also some elements that increase the replay of Frogger's Journey: The Forgotten Relic, like the Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance inspired furniture collection and the multiple paths unlocked by using the increasing abilities of Frogger. The game features almost 20 different levels and RPG-inspired gameplay on top of the classic Frogger formula.

name: Fractured Worlds
summary: Fractured Worlds is a collection of 8 blue/cyan Boom compatible (cl9) maps, spanning a wide variety of themes and presenting some challenging set piece encounters and incidental combat. There are some large and small maps, and each one contains a secret fight, accessible by finding the hidden purple keycard in each level. There are 6 maps by me (7 including the anti-Underhalls map at the end) and 2 secrets maps by Scotty and Insane Gazebo, taking the map 31 and 32 slots respectively. Maps jump from tech gardens and deep caverns to grand neo-gothic architecture and abstract void spaces.

name: Fresh Reversi
summary: Reversi is a very addictive and brain challenging game. This is a fun and productive way to free yourself from boredom because you can sharpen your strategy skill as you play.

name: Frightened Beetles
summary: Something terrible happened in the forest! Someone frightened all Bugs! What happened? You are the only one who can find it out!

name: Franchise Wars
summary: Franchise Wars is a turn-based isometric puzzle strategy game, or puzzegy game. Play as Frog Pop, one of the last remaining fast food restaurants, on a campaign to destroy arch-rival Munch Point. Control various units, each with a unique mechanic, as you set out to best the food service industry.

name: Frontline Gallop
summary: This is a scrolling, top-down war game. You control a tank armed with soldiers, and must shoot enemy tanks and bases while also strategically releasing your soldiers so they can attack.

name: Freediving Hunter: Spearfishing the World
summary: Defeat spearfishing challengers and unlock new places around the world. Buy new masks, fins, guns, wetsuits and flashlights to gain advantage. Conquer the ocean depths. Ward off hungry sharks trying to steal your fish and avoid a deadly blackout.

name: Fraudulent Idols
summary: Sit back and explore FRAUDULENT IDOLS a Fixed-Camera experience of horror, puzzles, traps, fighting, and boss fights. Deeper levels of STRATA will contain progressively more difficult creatures and hazards. A players quest ends with the defeat of all doubt. Which rests deep in the heart.

name: Freeway Fury 2
summary:
The sequel is finally here! Lots of news features included!

Don't you sometimes wish you could just jump over traffic somehow? In Freeway Fury you can!

Quickly switch vehicles to get ahead faster, or to avoid bursting into flames. Crazy stunts award you with points and nitro boost! Can you reach the finish line before time runs out?

Reach all 7 different endings for the final BOSS battle! Or try FREE RIDE mode with lots of fun modifications to the game! Release your fury!!!

name: FromPulse
summary: An abstract, rhythmic platformer with time-travel elements.

name: Front Line Pack
summary:
Are you always playing Front Line Champions and securing the point for your team? We’ve got just what you need: the Front Line Pack, which rewards players who are tough and selfless with a whole bunch of goodies. PLUS we’ll throw in the Limited Enforcer Fernando Skin! It’s a good time to be a tank!

Breach and clear the capture point with the Enforcer Fernando Skin. 

Show off how awesome you are with the Stat Tracking Spray. Unlock 5 Legendary Cards for Front Line Champions with Legendary Enchanted Keys. And bank 10,000 VIP Points to grab an Epic item in the VIP Store.

The Front Line Pack includes:
Enforcer Fernando Skin
Legendary Stat Tracking Spray
5 Front Line Legendary Keys
5 Radiant Chests
10,000 VIP Points

name: Frogworld
summary: Frogworld is an immersive VR adventure that puts you in the body of a little bullfrog. Jump, crawl, and swim away from environmental dangers and natural predators as you search for a new, healthy ecosystem to call home.

name: Fright Night
summary: Fright Night is a single-player horror game, where you can feel the scary atmosphere and live through the story of the main protagonist.

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 3: Winter Kills
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Fruit Blade
summary: Fruit Blade is an action game that is included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: FreeOrion
summary: A free, open source, turn-based space empire and galactic conquest (4X) computer game being designed and built by the FreeOrion project. FreeOrion is inspired by the tradition of the Master of Orion games, but is not a clone or remake of that series or any other game.

name: Fruit Row
summary: Is an intelligent game in the style of "Tetris", but in modern processing, where you have to line up the same fruit in a row to get experience points

name: Frank Bruno's Boxing
summary: "Super Punch-Out" clone.

name: Frak
summary: Challenge yourself or a friend to a game of Frak and see who has the fastest reactions.

name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Ralsei
summary: Have you ever wanted to sing against a fluffy boy? Well, now's your chance!

name: Frozen Honey ASMR
summary: Enjoy making your frozen honey jelly desserts from scratch in the most satisfying ASMR game!

name: Frontier - TRS
summary: Frontier – Tactical Response Squad is a fast-paced top down shooter based in a dystopian future where mage corporations are in control. The corporations driven the environment to the edge with excessive resource extraction and humanity is forced to live in a high-tech bio domes.

name: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path
summary: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path is a free update for Fragrant Story. This update adds a significant amount of content, and is much larger than the original game.

name: Frogger
summary:
A port of Frogger for the Game.com.

The Frogger version for Game.com features two variations within the cartridge. The first version mirrors the original arcade game, where the objective is to guide five frogs, one at a time, across a bustling street and a river to reach their designated homes safely. The second version is an enhanced edition, incorporating newer levels. Some levels consist of only two segments of river or road, while others present a single extensive stretch of road without a designated safe zone in the centre. Additionally, Game.com allows up to four players to participate, taking turns during gameplay.

name: Frank the Flea
summary: Frank is lost. He wants his Mummy. He knows that she is somewhere on the 2nd floor of Major Mansion, but where?

name: Frick Frack
summary:
A puzzle simulation game about hurting what you love the most. You must find the perfect work-life balance but the work you do directly affects
the world around you. Good luck.

name: Frankenstein: Story Type Room Escape Adventure
summary: A genius scientist who wanted to revolutionize life science and contribute to developing mankind, Alphonse Frankenstein. But as the family got destroyed by the sabotage of the opposing party, his son Victor Frankenstein vowed to avenge his father...

name: French Meat 2
summary: French Meat 2 is a single-player one episode fan add-on for Blood, featuring eight maps which was created between 2013 to November 2019, and is the sequel to the original French Meat (2012). Unlike the original, it features new art assets in the form of a reworked TILES018.ART, including several pieces from Cryptic Passage and new graphics to aid in its tropical island setting. The original episode is also included, with some upgrades, as well as a bonus level in the third episode slot.

name: Frozen Synapse 2
summary: Frozen Synapse 2 is the sequel to the award-winning turn-based tactical game. Command your squads in a vast procedurally generated city: enter any building, perform any mission, execute any strategy.

name: Frontiers.io: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Frontiers.io - Expansion Pack 1 This pack contains 16 new Monster, Knights and animal Characters. Unlock them all. Your goal? To conquer as much territory as possible. It's initially very simple, and the game can be mastered immediately, but watch out: there's competition, and not everyone can win!

name: Frogo Deluxe
summary: Frogo Deluxe is the latest installment in the popular Frogo series. In this cross road game, players must navigate through various obstacles, collecting coins and special items along the way. The coins collected can be used to purchase new animals, each with more lives, enhancing the gameplay experience. The game is infinite, becoming more challenging as players achieve higher scores. How far can you go?

name: Froggy BOI
summary: Froggy BOI - a game about the usual schoolboy, who was going home from school, in his backpack he had only pens, pencils and textbooks. He decided to shorten the path and go home through the forest...

name: Fruit Basket
summary: Fruit Basket is an arcade game that makes your brain work to the maximum. Jump over the fruits, getting further and further to the basket. Pepper flying on its axis can send you to the beginning. Cactus is also dangerous. The game is not for the "weak".

name: Frequency Sync
summary: Drive the world and make it dance as you piece together the geometric puzzles and build musical tracks that are intertwined.

name: Freedom Fighter
summary: A laserdisc game which used Japanese animation from the movies Galaxy Express 999 and Adieu, Galaxy Express

name: Fragments
summary:
FRAGMENTS is a 2D, psychological, twisted piece of interactive fiction set in the very near future. You play as Evan, a young guy wrestling with his own mind as to whether he did, or did not do a serious crime.

Should he fail to get to the bottom of the truth via reconstructions of some of his most traumatizing memories, he risks spending the rest of his life behind bars. Two detectives stand in his way, and both claim it is in Evan's best interests to deliver them the information they need.

Make decisions. Affect outcomes. Inhabit Evan's mind, and shape his conclusion at the facility.

name: Froggies at the Zoo
summary: Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.

name: Frogger TV Arcade
summary: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Freedom Defender
summary: Freedom Defender is a satirical tower defense game set in a fictional country obsessed in keeping it's borders free from foreigners.

name: From Light
summary: Embark on a journey through a kingdom ravaged by plague, greed and magic. You are the only who can bring about their salvation, and yours also depends on your success in that task!

name: Frog & Spiders
summary: An arcade shooter from Taito in 1981 in the vein of Space Invaders.

name: Fruit Warrior AR
summary:
Ever felt like a fighter, a samurai, or even a warrior?
Ever wanted to bash and smash fruits as if there was no tomorrow?
You don't like unrealistic looking stuff?
Then this game is right for you!

name: From the Sun to the Moon
summary: Soleil (pronounced “soh-lay”) and her girlfriend Esmeray (pronounced “ehz-mer-ay”) have been together for almost three years! Leading up to their third year anniversary, Soleil decides the best way to celebrate would be to take Esmeray out on a date each day leading up to their anniversary! Will the dates be successful, or end in total failure? Play now to find out!

name: Fragment of Humanity
summary: a first person virtual reality game explore a lab full of dangers, fight creatures.

name: Fruit Ninja
summary: Unofficial port of Fruit Ninja for the PSP.

name: Frog Fighters
summary: Frog Fighters is a light-hearted, fast-paced, third-person-shooter where you become a frog on a lily pad with an ability to shoot other flying frogs with different types of laser-leafs.

name: Frag
summary: Frag is a roguelike gridless turn-based game of tactical combat that takes place in the near future. Kill the enemy. Grab the loot. Craft new gear. Level up your team. Learn new skills. If you lose a single match, you are done. How long can you survive?

name: Frogger
summary: An unofficial port of the 1981 Konami arcade game for BBC Microcomputer Software.

name: Frogmaster
summary: Frogmaster is a soccer game for one to four players. The players control tadpoles on the pitch, which react to joystick input which act as rewards. The player must train the tadpoles to score goals by reaching the other side of the pitch. Added challenge is generated by walls on the pitch and evolving tadpoles into frogs which can lay eggs and eat other tadpoles. In the original Mainframe version there were only frogs.

name: Free Road
summary:
This is a puzzle game, where you need to pave the way for a car.
To put the road, you must select the desired one and drag it to the empty block. To remove the road, you need to tap on it. At the moment, the game has 45 levels.

name: Freeze Tag Fun Pack #1
summary:
Traverse a map of an ancient land and solve plenty of puzzles on the way.  Control the chameleon idol and, using its magic power, blast gems before they reach the hole. At the end of each level, the score is converted to money that you can spend at the shop to buy extra lives or new skins for the chameleon. Each skin comes with different powerups and effects.

Catch a boatload of fishy fun in this original arcade challenge! Load up the RV and crisscross the country in a series of tournaments that will put your angling prowess to the test. Cast your line in colorful locations like Bullhorn Lake, Golden Corn Lake, and Wicked Mansion Lake. Catch fish to earn points and climb to the top of the rankings in the amateur, pro, and elite circuits. Your fellow fishers are sure to keep you on your toes, but watch out for surprises swimming just below the surface that will slow you down.

Featuring innovative gameplay, colorful full-screen graphics, and hours of fun for the whole family, Fishing Craze is no fish-tale, it's the real thing! Catch it today.

name: Froggy Castle 2
summary:
Hamster Pit and Princess Patty peer anxiously over the ocean.
A loud croak is heard in the air; the frogs are coming!

Accompany Pit and Patty on numerous levels in a concerted effort to deflate the thick frogs. In this adventure you’ll sail across the seas to meet your biggest challenge on a mysterious volcanic island.

Save the kingdom so that the hamster can sleep peacefully.

name: Fractured
summary: Fractured is a side scroll action game focused on boss battles. As the hero, you take on different boss fights from underground monsters to fighting dragons. Learn from each fight to gain to skill necessary to take down epic monsters.

name: Frogger
summary: The Timex Sinclair 2068 port of Frogger.

name: Frog Space
summary: Frog Space is a game about the adventures of frog 'Froxy' that avoids obstacles such as animals, vehicles, and terrain. Since only the skills and senses of the player are the only ways to clear this game, it requires a high level of concentration, equanimity, and a challenging spirit.

name: Free Fall
summary: 2D action game, developed by Color Dreams. The game was never released, remaining only in the prototype phase. However, independent companies released it in 2010 (National Games Depot - NDG, The NES Dump) and Piko Interactive released it again in 2017. Released exclusively for NES. You control a hand who must catch falling things and then throw them back up to safety.

name: Fragile Equilibrium
summary: Fragile Equilibrium is a game about the imperfection and impermanence of life. It is a reflection on transience, a balancing act to find beauty in decay and inevitable destruction. [FE] invites the player to explore a world of quick actions, forced decisions, and subtle shmup-style strategy.

name: Fritz: Don't Call Me a Chess Bot
summary: Play chess with interactive hints and tips

name: Frostage
summary: In a kingdom far away, the light became extinct. There, lost in darkness, people started to afflict. There’s no more warmth, there’s no more light.

name: Fruit Conflict
summary: The game consists of many worlds, your goal is to progress and get all the skins and profile pictures or you can even play 1v1 with your friend.

name: Frankie and Suede Private Detectives
summary: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure.

name: Frame City Killer
summary: A third person action game where you take control of Crow, who must kill Khan and save Frame City. The game was canceled by Namco in 2006.

name: Front Edge
summary: Front Edge is a real-time strategy game set in a modern warfare setting.

name: Frantic Frankfurt
summary: Frantic Frankfurt for iOS is a simple game. It is based on the card game by Günter Burkhardt.

name: Fracas
summary: Fracas is Stuart Smith's very first game, using the game system which would later develop into Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves and ultimately Adventure Construction Set. Like those games, it is combat-oriented turn-based RPG and one of its main features is the large numbers of characters, both good and bad, that can get involved in the battles at once. You may control one or more characters in the game, and move them about fighting bad guys and gaining treasures.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Mario's Madness v2
summary:
Mario's Madness v2 Is Finally Here, 29 NEW and Remade Songs + the original 7 songs from v1, a lot of characters, stages, mechanics and new extra additions in the mod, Beat all the songs to try to defeat mario for good.

Be ready, survive, and say hello to murder.

name: Freddi Fish: ABC's Under the Sea
Froglin Friend and the White Tower: Pt1
summary: A treasure map. A white star.

name: FriendZoned Archer
summary: FriendZoned Archer is an action adventure game inspired by the classic NES Zelda. There is complete freedom of exploration, hidden Areas, hidden dungeons and key items to help you ease through the open world. The combat focuses on shooting and combos and the key items can interact with enemies, world and bosses thus drawing inspirations from the sandbox nature of open world games.

name: Franky Lettuce
summary: Franky Lettuce is a 2D Platformer with 44 Levels. Help Franky to discover the world and solve hidden puzzles in each level.

name: From Light
summary: A 2D puzzle platformer that uses light mechanics similar to photography exposure.

name: Froglike: The Frog Roguelike
summary:
Survive until the end of time itself, dodging deadly enemies and growing stronger in this fast-paced adventure.
Keep the Lily of Time powered up as long as possible, gaining points and breaking highscores.
Unlock and upgrade a variety of items to help you your journey! We’ve got everything from time freezing ice cubes to environmentally friendly bombs!
Discover a variety of skins (alternate timeline frogs!) to play in style. There’s no limit to the ridiculousness of the designs, nor the froginess of their names.
Listen to the never-ending ramblings of Chronos, the physical manifestation of time.
Can you reach the literal end of time?!

name: Free.ksPeak
summary: Aim for the "peak" of the freak world with a card game! FREEK.S PEAK, a trading card game full of freaks. Defeat enemies and acquire cards. Build your deck with the cards you get and become the best card player!

name: Frack the World
summary: Frack the World is a resource management game about successfully running a hydrofracking company while also dealing with the state of the environment.

name: FrostRunner
summary: FrostRunner is a first-person platformer “speedrunning” game, where the player rapidly completes platforming challenges before the timer runs out. Using their tether tool, players compete to finish each of the 36 unique levels as quickly as possible and earn a place at the top of the leaderboards.

name: Fruit Fusion
summary: A mobile game with a variation of the match-3 genre developed by Insomniac Games.

name: Frost
summary: Draw paths to guide the flocking spirits to their home planets. Watch countless beautiful creatures emerge from light, bring balance to a world in constant motion, and unravel its mysteries.

name: F-Rank Hero Story
summary: This beautiful fantasy world will never be friendly to you. Games mimic many aspects of real life. You are a insignificant F mercenary in a world where magic and monsters exist.

name: Fragment
summary:
Follow Rose Ilya on her quest to the Fountain of Life. Down the abandoned mines she'll encounter many strange creatures. They were once people who mined for Crystal Fragments, but the toxic air turned them into blood thirsty monsters.

Your ammo is limited so use your bullets wisely. Collect as many Fragments as you can, and reach for the Fountain!

Features:

English Voice Acting and Subtitles
Interactive Tutorials
Xbox 360 Controller Compatibility with Heart Pounding Rumble!

name: Frozen: Royal Castle
summary:
The world of Disney Frozen comes to life in this fun-filled doll house game, Disney Frozen Royal Castle!
Parents can have fun with kids while playing with Anna, Elsa, Kristoff and other Frozen dolls, as they dress up, cook, and explore!
Featuring content from the beloved films, kids can customize and play in their very own royal doll house, allowing them to express their creativity and imagination.

name: Frisson
summary: A single-player press start to play arcade game with an unlockable story, branching paths, achievements, and high-velocity audio-visual gameplay, set to an infinite-runner sci-fi vapor core.

name: Fragger 2
summary:
The long awaited sequel is finally here! Fragger is back and better than ever with all-new puzzles and explosive mayhem!
Introducing all new puzzle mechanics, like Gravity Boxes and Laser Switches.
Complete your missions by using your trusty hand grenades to solve puzzles and destroy the enemy. Enjoy the satisfying rain of debris as you blast your way to victory.
Conquer 3 worlds with a total of 90 levels. Each world introduces new gameplay elements and increasingly engaging puzzles.

name: Fruit Merge
summary: Fruit Merge is a puzzle game where players merge matching fruits to create bigger ones, ultimately aiming to make watermelons. You drop and position fruits strategically to set up merges, managing space to prevent the container from overflowing. The game challenges you to plan your moves carefully as larger fruits take up more room, and it rewards progression with higher-level fruits. The goal is to keep merging while avoiding game over and reaching the highest fruit size possible.

name: Fragmented World
summary: Reconnect a fragmented world by switching between two perspectives – one for exploration and another for manipulating the fragmented world. Overcome intermediate levels where you'll need to employ lateral thinking and make decisions. Can you once again unite a decadent and broken world?

name: Fragile Fighter
summary:
You see no light in your shadow.
Scared to face your mirror.
In your self-reflection.
You find your peace... your protection.

name: Freedom Planet 1+2 Bundle
summary: Experience the complete journey of Avalice's colorful heroines in Freedom Planet and Freedom Planet 2!

name: FreeFly Burning
summary: Fly the spherical drones, pass the levels in different modes, set new records!

name: Fruit Ninja Tournament Edition
summary: Slice to the top in the quickest, juiciest, most intense PvP experience on mobile.

name: Freestyle Ice Skater
summary: Freestyle Ice Skater is a casual action/sports game. Your goal is to join the local group of freestyle ice skaters, master your tricks and beat the rival team in an epic freestyle battle.

name: Frontier of Madness
summary: Join forces with friends in a thrilling multiplayer survival experience. Battle nightmarish creatures, construct resilient camps, and unravel the mysteries of a twisted world. But tread carefully, as the encroaching darkness tests your sanity. Will you survive together or succumb to madness?

name: From The Night
summary: Make your way through this retro world, by dodging traps to get from the start door to the end door.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Random Wees Dave & Bambi Extended
summary: Friday Night Funkin': Random Wees Dave & Bambi Extended is a mod directed and created by Sanco the fox, with the participation of juani clowny rabbit, Brick boy, LilyUwU, arten, and THE BIG BOSS lmao. The mod is a fan-made extension of Vs. Dave and Bambi.

name: Fragment's Note 2
summary: Fragment's Note 2 is a slice-of-life visual novel/dating sim featuring Kyoichi Akikawa, a boy who lost his family in an airplane accident, the heroines close to him, and the story that binds them together.

name: Fruit Ninja Academy: Math Master
summary: The world-famous fun of Fruit Ninja meets the very best in educational apps in Fruit Ninja Academy: Math Master! Join the Fruit Ninjas in an exciting adventure through jungles, temples and ancient ruins! The curious (and hungry) pig Truffles finds himself in a sticky situation, so Katsuro and his friends must journey to find the Lost Tablets of Fruitasia to rescue him.

name: Frog Soup
summary: A hack full of short levels and silly ideas.

name: Fruit Punch
summary: Are you looking for a fun game that will make you crave more? Would you like a game filled with humor, fun and some frustration? Then you have come to the right place!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Camellia
summary:
VS. Camellia is based around Camellia's music.

This mod adds brand new weeks featuring Camellia's character, numerous Camellia songs charted at 3 different difficulties, and more!

name: Friends for the Apocalypse
summary: Inspired by games like Smash TV and UBERMOSH. FFTA is a top-down action arena zombie survival base defense game. Control both man and dog as you work together to survive on a zombie infested procedural island.

name: Fringes of the Empire
summary:
Science Fiction Post-Apocalyptic Space RPG!!
Roguelike RPG + Top-Down Shooter = Fringes of the Empire
2D classic retro-style gameplay
Modder friendly - tell your own stories

name: Frozen Soul
summary: What is stronger - your unwillingness to die or the cold of the icy mountains? Challenge the severe nature and find out if your hero will be able to get home or remain in this cruel land forever!

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Episode 8: Future Shock
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Frog lands
summary: Solve riddles, go through dangerous traps and overthrow the dark magician!

name: Freedom Poopie
summary: Get the key to move forward! , Find the best way to achieve the level in the best time!, Dodge obstacles, enemies and survive to complete the level! Join Poopie on his adventure!

name: Frozen Injustice: Fridge Adventures
summary: Clean, fight, and save the fridge in this action-adventure platformer with classic 3D platforming gameplay! Play as Broco-Lee, a Kung Fu trainee, as you battle bacteria, rescue vegetables, and uncover mysteries across the fridge’s floors. Join the dojo and become the hero this epic adventure needs!

name: Frogger
summary: Frogger is a port of the original game of the same name for the mobile game and it was released on October 30, 2002 in Japanese markets and was developed and published by Konami.

name: Freestyle Football R
summary: FreestyleFootball is a street hip-hop animation style soccer ACG game created by JCE and published by Hoga. In the game, you will collect and play as different characters in PVP team Competition. The game mode includes 4v4 team competition and club league.

name: Frenzy!
summary: Frenzy! features non-stop mayhem as you swoop, dive and bomb your way to the skies and ultimate glory over nine action packed levels!

name: Fred Couples Golf
summary: Fred Couples Golf is a Sports game, developed by Sims and published by Sega, which was released in 1994.

name: Frag: Pro Shooter - Arena 11-13 Pro Player Pack
Frag: Pro Shooter - Arena 5-7 Power Warriors Pack
Frag: Pro Shooter - Arena 2-4 Exclusive Character Pack
Front Page Sports: Football
summary: The first release in Sierra's Front Page Sports series.

name: Fred the Rubber Ducky
summary: Help Fred navigate through the world in his search for destiny, where danger lies around the corner in each of the 8 unique handcrafted and challenging levels.

name: Fragment's Note: After Stories
summary: Fragment's Note: After Stories is the newest installment in the deeply-moving, romance visual novel series Fragment's Note. After Stories takes off immediately after the events of Fragment's Note, following the three heroines and the stories of their brand new beginnings.

name: Freed Soft
summary: Freed Soft is an it company simulator. You have to build your own IT Empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best SOFTWARE in the game world.

name: Frag: Pro Shooter - The Brawler Heroes Pack
Frag: Pro Shooter - The Free Friendly Frag Heroes Pack
Frag: Pro Shooter - The Fantasy Heroes Pack
Frag: Pro Shooter - The Explosive Heroes Pack
FriendShapes
summary: A jumpscare-free abstract horror existential crisis of a lite-RPG. Explore Digressions - areas that continue longer than they should with sets of randomized text events and map variations for a differing experience each time. Features a unique non-violent interaction system with various Entities.

name: Front Wars
summary: Front Wars is a turn-based strategy game. Take control of allied troops and revive the great battles of the second world war in a tense campaign against the german army, or you can challenge your friends online.

name: Fruit Hunter
summary: Hungry for some fruit! Jump into missions and hunt for fruits running for their lives. Use your trusty bow and magic-wand-with-fork and capture them before they have the chance to escape. Travel to different environments and discover what fruit that resides in these unfamiliar and rough landscapes.

name: Frontier Fortress
summary: Frontier Fortress is medieval-themed tower defense game. You are the leader of your nation. In the harsh medieval age you have to defend your land against foreign invaders. Fortify your frontier with defense structures and let none of them pass through your fortress.

name: Freak Show: Party Royale!
summary: Beat up and brutally kill your friends in this bloody party game for up to 6 players! Pick your freak and add your own punishments which the game will hand out based on performance after each mini game. Simple to play and a perfect game for any party!

name: From the Streets to the Script: A Carabanchel Story
summary: Create your character and experience a fun story in which you will meet friends, enemies and partners as you try to carry out a vital project with your friends: to create an anime before you finish your studies.

name: Fruit Lockers Reborn! 2
summary: An exciting match-3 twist! Fruit Lockers is back! Double your fun with Fruit Lockers Reborn! 2 - an exciting twist on the popular match-three puzzler.

name: Friday the 13th RPG: A Fan Game
summary: A fan project starring 13 playable characters in scenarios from the NES game and the first seven films.

name: Frogger
summary: Tabletop LCD port of the Arcade game Frogger.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Idol
summary: Friday Night Funkin': Idol is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the anime Oshi no Ko. The mod features various songs from the anime, including Idol.

name: Frontier Army 1644
summary: This is a silhouette style killing strategy game, players will lead the Ming army in the 17th century to complete the unfinished mission of the Ming Empire! Defeat the Nuzhen tribe, suppress the internal rebels, travel to the new world of America and start an epic war with the European empire!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Pibby Corrupted Kitchen Gun
summary: Friday Night Funkin': Pibby Corrupted Kitchen Gun is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based around the Kitchen Gun skit from The Peter Serafinowicz Show mixed in the corruption concept from Come and Learn with Pibby!. The mod showcases a theoretical situation where Derek Bum becomes corrupted and has to sing against Boyfriend.

name: Freetime Event: Poolside Edition
summary: A Super Danganronpa 2 fangame about a freetime event with Komaeda Nagito.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Soft
summary:
Friday Night Funkin’ Soft does not stay within canon by any means. It’s a remix of the base story and even though the characters are counterparts/based off of the ones you are familiar with, should not be expected to stick with said canon.

Friday Night Funkin’ Soft takes the basic reskin formula and turns it on it’s head. Its a new way to enjoy a beloved rhythm game with a focus on story telling, character design, and creativity.

name: Frobisher Says
summary: Frobisher Says is a surreal party game, where players must obey the whims of a strange little man called Frobisher, who is terribly spoilt and entirely used to getting his own way.

name: From Below Pocket
summary:
From the deepest trenches of the ocean, the Kraken has come!

As the Kraken climbs the walls of your fortress, repel it by hurtling blocks down at the monster. As lines are cleared, the Kraken will retreat, but only momentarily.

Can you survive the night, and live to fight another day?

Compatible with all Game Boy models, and enhanced for the Super Game Boy!

Featuring Two-Player simultaneous play!

name: Frontrunners
summary: Frontrunners is a blend of tactical shooter and survival horror. Work alone or with your friends to move tactically through a range of levels to complete paid contracts. Money means more guns and equipment. Fight against a horrific range of enemy entities that will hunt you relentlessly.

name: Franz
summary: An experimental game that is hard to classify in terms of genre. In the game Franz we interact in various ways with the title character, which nestled on our device. The behavior of our charge changes, depending on the ways in which we communicate with her.

name: Frogger: Helmet Chaos
summary: Frogger returns in an all-new platform game, Frogger Helmet Havoc. In the amphibious hero's latest adventure, Frogger must stop an evil force that threatens his home, Firefly Swamp, and the nearby kingdom of Bunnington Hollow. To stop Dr. Wani and his destructive mining efforts, you must help Frogger hop and dodge his way to the mastermind's lair. Frogger has unique abilities that allow him to climb walls, double-jump, tongue-grab, and more.

name: Fruit Bonanza
summary: Fruit Bonanza is an endless runner game in which the goal is to score the highest number of points. Various obstacles will hinder us in this

name: Frankenstein 2000
summary: An action game developed by Icon Software in which the player travels in a micro submarine through several organs of Frankenstein's body.

name: Frozen Knight
summary:
"Frozen Knight" is a third-person single-player action adventure game, with beautiful graphics and realistic fighting. In the game, the player must ride on his horse to use the weapon, destroy the enemy and find their own horse can win, must guarantee themselves and mount the amount of blood, the player can use the sword, pistol, bow and arrow on the horse to hurt the enemy, alive find another horse can win. 
WASD controls movement, 
F dismount 
The number 456 switches weapons 
F1 viewable help

name: Frigus Inferos
summary: Are you ready for a child's hell? Courage or run away?

name: Freaky Racing
summary:
The ultimate retro racing experience for your phone or tablet!
How long can you stay on the road in this addictive retro racer?
Dodge opponents and potholes as you power down the racetrack at blazing speed!

name: Friday Night Funkin' 64
summary: It's Friday Night! Play as the Boyfriend and battle Mario in this reimplementation of the hit indie game!

name: Fresh Force Frustrations: A Gay Superhero Erotic Visual Novel
summary: A creature attacks Fresh Force headquarters, leaving the team trapped, unable to get physically aroused, and with a traitor in their midst. Get back your ability to get off! Multiple endings, steamy gay action, plus spandex, tentacles, and more!

name: Front Office Football 2001
summary: The third game in the Front Office Football franchise and the last game published by Electronic Arts.

name: FreeSO
summary: A reimplementation of The Sims Online’s game engine, using C# and Monogame. While FreeSO aims to be faithful to the original game, it includes many quality of life changes such as hardware rendering, custom dynamic lighting, hi-res output and >2 floor houses.

name: From The Dust
summary: From The Dust is a fun and dynamic shoot'em up action game! Requiring reflexes and motor coordination. Fight steampunk machines to save your village. Can you complete this challenge?

name: Freestyle Street Soccer
summary: Urban Freestyle Soccer provides the player(s) with hours of twisted, unrealistic freestyle football/soccer. The players pick their team(s), depending on whether they're playing against the AI or another player, and play exciting and adrenaline rush filled matches.

name: Frog Wizard Gem Quest
summary: Discover the powers of magic gems and use them to solve puzzles!

name: Fragment's Note
summary: Fragment's Note is a slice-of-life Visual Novel with a touch of sci-fi. The story centers around two main protagonists and the Yanderes that they have to deal with.

name: Frontier Runner
summary: In Frontier Runner video game you play a character role in the mid-22nd century who was selected to travel on one of the first exploration ships that left earth to find new homes to expand mankind faiths, and ideologies.

name: Fruit Dating
summary:
Help the lonely fruit finding someone for a date in the original puzzle game.
FRUIT DATING is an original puzzle game in which you match pairs of fruit of the same color simply by swiping with your finger. The finger motion matches the tilting of the board in any given direction. So, while trying to fulfill your goal, various obstacles like stones, cars or other fruit, hinder the way.
With advanced levels the date-lusty fruit are encountering various other pitfalls such as: one-way tiles, puddles of mud or animal kingdom representatives looking forward to enliven their diet with juicy fruit!

name: Frog Minutes
summary: Frog Minutes is an iOS game developed by Grasshopper Manufacture, all proceeds of which will be donated to Red Cross Japan.

name: Fractium
summary: A ruthless looting & shooting survival rogue-like FPS for 1-4 players, set in a procedurally-generated world. Slay hordes, bandits, and bosses. Setup traps, research, craft, and upgrade gear across multiple biomes in order to stay alive.

name: Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball
summary:
Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball for Game Gear adapts the console versions' gameplay and options to the capabilities of the handheld systems.

While based on the 1995 MLB season, the game does not have a MLB license, so there are no real team names used. It does however have a MLBPA license, so features real player names and their associated statistics.

name: Fright Chasers: Director's Cut
summary: When rumors of an abandoned movie theater and the ghosts that can apparently abduct the living there appear on your blog, you eagerly go to investigate. When you arrive, you quickly find truth to the tales as you encounter specters from the very movies shown in the theater! Can you navigate your way through dangerous films to save the living in time? Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Fright Chasers: Soul Reaper
summary: Prominent people in the town of Glenville have begun disappearing. After receiving an anonymous tip, you learn that the disappearances may be the work of a supernatural killer. This sounds like another job for the Fright Chasers! Can you solve the mystery of Glenville and stop the murderer before they claim any more victims? Find out in this bone-chilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Frank the Miner
summary: Enter the mine with Frank the Miner, go hunting for precious gems and treasures and set your personal record.

name: FrogBall
summary: Football with Frogs

name: From Head to Toe
summary: From Head to Toe is a short interactive story about winter, existential guilt and your ex-classmates.

name: Freus
summary: Freus is a 2D platform adventure game. You will complete your revenge with the abilities given by THE devil in impressive pieces adventures.

name: Fright
summary: Move around a hauntred maze trying to find books of power.

name: FreeGen
summary: FreeGen is a 3D tactical multiplayer first person shooter in space. It s not a space sim - it s a combined indoor/outdoor shooter. So don t look for physical realism - look for action and cunning! The gameplay demo is just a conceptual version of FreeGen which demonstrates the main idea of the game. The demo is LAN multiplayer only without Internet and singleplay (bots) which of course will be added later. In the final release most code (graphics and network engine AI etc.) and art will be changed or replaced. We just think that conceptual demo is better than conceptual art or movies and screenshots.

name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle - Cyber Jason
summary: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. From the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations, Jason will terrorize victims across the world... and beyond!

name: Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins
summary:
After the popular Apple Arcade game 'Frogger in Toy Town,' an all-new Frogger game 'Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins' (Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins) leaps into action!

Make your way through puzzle-ridden ruins and unravel the mysteries of the Ancient Salientians.

name: Fray
summary: FRAY Game is a rhythm based puzzle game about two brothers Tullio and Ziya. Take control of Tullio to move to the beat and master energy blasting dance moves to light the way through a maze-like world of dance challenges and to battle cunning enemies who attempt to break the bond between brothers.

name: Freelancer Simulator 2
summary:
Game Description: 
Create your own startup from scratch! Work at freelance, build your own games or applications, promote your projects and don't forget about your character life! Play the original sequel to the series that once won the love of millions of players! 
 
A unique gaming experience in the businessman life simulator. Complete the entire experience from scratch to billions of dollars. Beautiful graphic design, unique sound and interesting gameplay will plunge you headlong into the life of a freelancer! 
 
Follow the market trends, develop or create new technologies in the Freelancer Simulator! Participate in ratings with other players and discover new achievements in the game! 
 
Game Features: 
- Create your games and applications; 
- Develop your startup, find investments; 
- Follow the mood and vital indicators of the hero; 
- Upgrade your equipment and create new ones; 
- Negotiate with customers or attend exhibitions! 
- Play without the Internet! 
 
The game is easily synchronized between devices. And when connected to the Internet, all game functions open. Or you can play offline! 
 
Freelancer Simulator 2 — absolutely free game, but some game elements can be bought for real money. The in-app purchase feature is disabled in the device’s settings. 
 
And in conclusion, we want to say a huge THANK YOU to everyone who plays Freelancer Simulator 2!

name: Freak Run
summary: Freak Run is an online multiplayer running game that you can enjoy with other players around the world. Compete with randomly selected players to run the race faster.

name: Frogger
summary: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Frostpunk: Complete Collection
summary: A highly acclaimed society survival game, now in Complete Collection that grants you access to the full game and all DLCs.

name: Frankenstein's Monsters, Inc.
summary: What if Dr Frankenstein was a businessman?

name: Frobozz Magic Support
summary: You play as a novice glyph support clerk but no one's around but an animated burin. It seems the more experienced support clerks are either lost, got themselves un-implemented, or got stuck in a timeloop. And, of course, everyone else in Zork wants assistance too. No one said your first day on the job would be easy!

name: Frost Byte
summary:
In Frost Byte you control Hickey the Kreezer, an elastic curve which moves sideways, jumps and shoots. You must navigate your way through planet Cosmica, and rescue your brethren, within the limited 'Twang' energy you have.

Cosmica is full of hideous monsters, many of which can be shot. Your character builds momentum as it moves, so some hazards are easier to clear from a running start. You can only jump vertically, although you have control as the character falls. Ammunition is limited, and must be collected throughout your quest.

Three sweets which enhance your character can be collected - the red one increases your speed, blue increases the height of your leap, and green means you can safely fall further. There are additional objects to pick up and use as well.

name: Frio: Lost In Old Town
summary: A horror adventure game with a various actions.

name: Frogger
summary: Game Boy port of Frogger.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Homr
summary:
This is the VS HOMR mod.

Yeah, not so dumb, a full week and 3 songs in freeplay

Idk

Cool songs I think

name: Froggerty Arcade
summary: Tudou Games' arcade hit finally lands on Steam! - 3 game modes that will take you back to 1980’s stylee complete with a fresh new look

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizza Massacre
summary: Kill the lovely animal robots that scared us...

name: Frantic Fanfic
summary:
A brand spankin’ new creative writing party game where friends furiously write each other’s fanfiction: Frantic Fanfic.
This game takes inspiration from the classic “pass the story” with a nerdy pop-culture twist.
Frantic Fanfic is a fandom-frenzied supercharged mess of exposition, rising action, falling action, resolution and everything in-between!

name: Framed Wings
summary: Framed Wings is an indie action adventure RPG inspired by the Zelda game series. Take your sword and slash through countless enemies, explore caves and dungeons, complete quests, solve challenging puzzles, and slay formidable bosses.

name: Free Kick X
summary: Become the legendary freekicker in the Football arena with Free Kick X. Play with different countries. Think tactical, be quick against the time and enjoy the free kicks!

name: Freja
summary: Freja is a first-person psychological horror game with a unique approach. You take the role of a woman with PTSD and selective amnesia and must help her remember her past traumatic experiences through exploration and arcade games.

name: Freshly fried shrimps seemed hot additionally named noth
summary: A laughable 2D-RPG made with RPG Maker MV

name: Frozen Time
summary:
You need an OpenGL port with support of ZDoom extended nodes, hi-res textures and tall patches.

GLBoom-Plus with gamma 1 is recommended.

name: From Day to Day
summary: The game "From Day To Day" is a psychological thriller in the first person. You bought a seemingly ordinary abandoned house to start life with a clean slate after the tragic events in your family.

name: Front Page Sports: Football Pro '95
summary: 1995 edition of the popular PC football game developed by Dynamix.

name: Frank's Adventure
summary: Frank's Adventure is an adult top-down indie Flash game by Mausland Entertainment from 2003.

name: Frogger: Beats n' Bounces
summary: Frogger: Beats n' Bounces is an action-rhythm game which was developed and published by Konami on 2008 for mobile phones. It is part of the Frogger series.

name: Framing Dawes
summary: Join Bay Dawes and her dead pet rabbit, Dink on their fairy-tale adventure to discover who is Framing Dawes. Talk to inanimate objects, time travel and cast spells while you explore the beautiful 2D hand-drawn world.

name: Friday Night Funkin' VR
summary: The coolest rhythm game in first person! A VR fan-made port of the hit open-source indie game, Friday Night Funkin'.

name: Friday the 13th: Return to Camp Blood
summary: Play as Jason & kill the campers.

name: Frog
summary:
How low can you go?

Fire up your NES console or favorite emulator and prepare for some truly ribbeting game-play as you descend to the depths.

name: Friday the 13th: The Game - Spring Break 1984 Clothing Pack
summary: The latest fashions from 1984 for each counselor!

name: Franky, Joe & Dirk... On the Tiles
summary: The Joe and Mac, Dragon's Lair and Dr. Franken franchises combine in this tile sliding puzzle game. A rather bizarre concept given the source material but does the gameplay stand on its own merits?

name: Frogger: Hyper Arcade Edition
summary: Frogger gets the Pac-Man Championship Edition treatment and then some in this update from Zombie Studios.

name: Frankenstein: Beyond the Time
summary: Take on an adventure in a place where the unsettling thoughts of Dr. Frankenstein will haunt your mind. The only thing that matters is to finish his last masterpiece. Are you brave enough to become the time master and continue Dr. Frankenstein’s legacy?

name: Fray in Magical Adventure
summary:
Fray in Magical Adventure, also known as just Fray (フレイ) and Fray-Xak Epilogue (Gai-den), is a 1990 spin-off "gaiden" (sidestory) game in a role-playing video game series Xak developed and published by the Japanese software developer MicroCabin. Even though it is directly connected to the more serious Xak storyline, Fray has a less serious tone and light-hearted comedic approach to telling the story. It was originally released for the MSX2 and was later ported to several different systems, among them MSX turbo R, PC-9801, PC Engine (as Fray CD), and Game Gear.
Fray is a simple action RPG. The game proceeds by the player's character Fray fighting through a preset overhead view map shooting opposing monsters, jumping over obstacles, and locating powerups and Gold, the game's currency, along the way. At the end of each stage the player will fight a boss and enter a town or safe haven where the player can purchase new equipment, hit points and the option to save their progress. Fray advances in power through the items that she can equip such as different rods and shields. Battles are in real-time as Fray walks around on automatic vertically scrolling game map as well as the monster characters. She has an attack and defense rating, and can switch between different projectile weapon styles as well as use special attacks and healing items

name: Free Chess: Cheese Set
summary: IT'S CHEESE NOT CHESS!

name: Frog Jump
summary: Doodle Jump clone

summary: Fringe Wars is a sci-fi MOBA from Oasis Games.

summary: Browser-based Fruit Ninja.
